fields.title: POWER AGAINST EVIL PATTERNS
fields.prayers:
Prayer Points
1.    Thank God for His provision so far.
2.    You evil pattern of Marital Failure in my life, I destroy you, in the name of Jesus.
3.    O God of success, my marital life must not fail, in the name of Jesus.
4.    The failure that happened in the lives of my parents, will not happen in my life, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every plantation of witchcraft in my family, what are you waiting for? Die, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Every pattern of household witchcraft in my family, I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
7.    O God arise, and let every witchcraft power release my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every stronghold of death and tragedy in my family, scatter by fire, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every messenger of death operating in my family line, die in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every garment of evil pattern against my divine goal, roast, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every evil pattern of non-achievement in my family clear out now, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every giant of almost -there in my family, drop dead, in the name of Jesus.
13.    You evil pattern of poverty, die, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every bacteria of poverty in my life, die in the name of Jesus.
15.    O Lord, let my life attract prosperity, in the name of Jesus.
16.    I command every pattern of Chronic disease in my life to cease, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Every evil pattern of infirmity in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
18.    I disconnect my life from all evil calendars in the name of Jesus.
19.    Every river of sadness, dry up by fire, in the name of Jesus.
20.    Crying shall not be my lot again, in the name of of Jesus.
21.    Every curse of disorder upon my family, be broken by fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.    O Lord, manifest your glory in my family, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Every pattern of failure in my root, die, in the name of Jesus.
24.    I wash away every deposit of failure, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every evil pattern of marital failure in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
26.    Every evil pattern of unstable husband/wife in my life, break in the name of Jesus.
27.    You the spirit of lesbianism, I am not your candidate, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Lord, deliver me from every evil altar of Lesbianism, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Any area of my life that the spirit of lesbianism has gripped, break free by fire, in the name of Jesus
30.    I receive fire to destroy every sexual defilement in my life, in the name of Jesus. (Repeat Seven times)
31.    You stronghold of sexual impurity in my body, I pull you down, in the name of Jesus.
32.    I shake away every serpent of sexual immorality hiding in my life, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Every wall of Jericho of adultery in my life, I pull you down, in the mighty name of Jesus.
34.    Every satanic influence in my life, be quenched by fire, in the name of Jesus.
35.    Every anointing of destructive anger in my blood, dry up by fire, in the name of Jesus.
36.    O Lord, deliver me from the spirit of ancestral anger in the name of Jesus.
37.    You the satanic strongman of anger assigned to push me to hell, die, in the name of Jesus.
38.    Every evil pattern of Jezebel Spirit in my life, die by fire, in the name of Jesus.
39.    Every contract of evil pattern of Jezebel spirit in my family, terminated, in the name of Jesus.
40.    Every seed of depression in the salvation of my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
41.    O God my father, send down your fire, turn me to fire, on the mountain of fire, in the name of Jesus.
42.    You the root cause of bad habits, together with your branches, die, in the name of Jesus.
43.    Every ancestral spirit, responsible for bad habits in my life, be utterly destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
44.    O Lord, strengthen me for holy living pattern in the name of Jesus.
45.    O God, forgive me today, of every sin of unforgiveness in my family, in the name of Jesus.
46.    God arise, and help me to recover all my blessings that I have lost as a result of evil pattern, in the name of Jesus.
47.    I receive the power to overcome, in the name of Jesus
48.    Thank God for answers to your prayers.
49.    O Lord, repair every damage done to my life by evil pattern of argumentative spirit, in the name of Jesus.
50.    Every satanic attempt to downgrade my potentials with argumentative spirit, be frustrated now, in the name of Jesus.
51.    Every root of bitterness in my life, die, in the name of Jesus
52.    Blood of Jesus Christ, purge every bitterness away from my life, in the name of Jesus.
53.    Everything that bitterness has destroyed in my life, be restored by the resurrection power of God, in the name of Jesus.
54.    Every curse and pattern of careless indifference, affecting my destiny, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
55.    The salt of my life shall not become sand, in the name of Jesus.
56.    Every evil word spoken in my home town against my family, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
57.    I shall reach my goal whatever anybody says about me, in the name of Jesus.
58.    Every power magnetizing me to the pattern of confusion, I bury you alive today, in the name of Jesus.
59.    You pattern of confusion turning me back at the edge of breakthroughs, enough is enough, die, in the name of Jesus.
60.    Every cycle of confusion operating in my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
61.    Every lying tongue against me, roast by fire, in the name of Jesus.
62.    Any evil lie planted in anybody's heart against me, be melted by fire, in the name of Jesus.
63.    Any satanic agent that has ever lied against me, receive angelic slap; receive divine hammer and die, in the name of Jesus.
64.    Every family fountain chasing away my helpers, dry up by fire, in the name of Jesus.
65.    O Lord, pour your anointing of favour upon my life, in the name of Jesus.
66.    Every power attacking my blessing day and night, vanish, in the name of Jesus
67.    O God arise and give me the anointing of the winners, in the name of Jesus.
68.    Every hidden curse of evil pattern, riding upon the horses of my destiny, I pull you down by fire, in the name of Jesus.
69.    Every re-arrangement of my destiny through the curse of evil pattern, be reversed by fire, in the name of Jesus.
70.    I . . . , begin to follow divine pattern for my life from today, in the name of Jesus.
71.    Every evil pattern of slavery in my family die, by fire in the name of Jesus.
72.    I refuse to work like an elephant and eat like an ant, in the name of Jesus.
73.    O Lord, let all my problems become my promotions in the name of Jesus.
74.    Every pattern of laziness and slavery in my foundation, break, in the name of Jesus.
75.    Any evil pattern of laziness sponsoring fear and wastage in my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
76.    My life, refuse to co-operate with the spirit of laziness, in the name of Jesus.
77.    I break free and lose myself from the grip and control of family idol spirit in the name of Jesus.
78.    Every problem in my life promoted by idol worship, die in the name of Jesus
79.    O Lord, deliver me from every evil pattern, emanating from evil family idol, in the name of Jesus.
80.    Every arrow of mental disorder, fired into my brain, go back to your sender, in the name of Jesus.
81.    Every evil computer system against my life in the demonic world, shatter to pieces, in the name of Jesus.
82.    Any evil pot cooking my destiny, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
83.    Evil pattern of horrible dreams in my life, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
84.    Let every evil pattern of satanic discipline in my life be terminated, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DESTROY THE SPIRIT OF FEAR
fields.prayers:
Praise Worship                                                                                   
Confession:
The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid? When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell. Though a host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident. (Psalm 27:1-3).

Make this power confession before you continue.
I announce that greater is the One that is in me than any devil on the side of my enemies. It is written, the righteous is as bold as a lion. By my faith in Christ Jesus, I am righteous. I receive my divine boldness. The angels of the Lord encamped round about them that fear Him. The angels of God are with me, I have no basis to fear any man, any evil, any evil spirit. Because the Lord of hosts is with me, I take my confidence in Him. It is written If God be for us who can be against us? God is with me, I have no enough reason to fear, in the name of Jesus. It is written, The Lord is my light and my salvation whom shall, I fear? The Lord is the defense of my life of whom shall I be afraid? Though a host of demons encamp against me, my heart will not fear; though war rises against me, even in this I shall be confident. The Lord is with me like a mighty terrible one. I am not afraid. I cannot be threatened. My persecutors shall stumble and fumble. Their everlasting confusion and disgrace shall never be forgotten. God has commanded me to fear not. Of the 366 days in a year, no single day is allowed for me to fear. So, I refuse to be afraid of anything. You spirit of fear, you are not in God's agenda for me. I dismiss you from my life now, in the name of Jesus. Jesus said even the very hairs of my head are not only counted but numbered. Not one single strand can be removed without God's knowledge and permission. Therefore, I put my confidence in the Lord, who takes so such care of me.


Prayer Points           
1.    In the name of Jesus, I refuse to fear, because God has not given me the spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of a sound mind.
2.    I bind the spirit of fear in my life, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I break every evil covenant that has brought fear into my life, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I command every terror of the night that has brought fear into my life to stop and move from my environment, in the name of Jesus.
5.    You spirit of fear, loose your hold upon my life and my family, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I command all human agents using the spirits of fear to terrify me in the night to stumble and fall, in the name of Jesus.
7.    The fear and terror of the unbelievers shall not be my lot, in the name of Jesus.
8.    My tomorrow is blessed is Christ Jesus, therefore, you spirit that is responsible for the fear of tomorrow in my life, I bind you, in the name of Jesus.
9.    My destiny is attached to God, therefore I decree that I can never fail, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every bondage that I am subjecting myself to by the spirit of fear, I break you, in the name of Jesus.
11.    All negative doors that the spirit of fear has opened in the past, be closed now, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every disease, oppression and depression that came into my life as a result of fear, disappear now, in the name of Jesus.
13.    I refuse to be intimidated by any demonic nightmare, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every enchantment and invocation of fear being made against me, I neutralize you and I command you to fail, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every confederacy of the enemies in my home with the enemies outside shall not stand, in the name o f Jesus.
16.    All arrangements of the devil concerning my home shall not stand; neither shall they come to pass, in the name of Jesus.
17.    I destroy all efforts of the enemy to frustrate my work, in the name of Jesus.
18.    I nullify every writing, agreement or covenant against my work, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Father Lord, increase my greatness and comfort me on every side, in the name of Jesus.
20.    O Lord, as You delight in my prosperity, I pray that You bless me indeed in my work. Let no household enemy be able to control my well-being any longer, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Let all those who are against me without a cause in my place of work turn back and be brought to confusion, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I close every door through which the enemies have been working against my work, in the name of Jesus.
23.    No weapon of satan and his agents fashioned against me shall prosper, in the name of Jesus.
24.    My life is hid with Christ in God, therefore nobody can kill me or harm me, in the name of Jesus.
25.    I open wide all doors leading to my blessings, victory and breakthroughs which the enemies have closed, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Let every territorial spirit working against us in our neighborhood be frustrated, bound and cast out, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Let every power contrary to the power of God operating to suppress people in my area be neutralized, in the name of Jesus.
28.    I bind every spirit of frustration, defeat, delayed blessing and fear in my environment, in the name of Jesus.
29.    I banish every enemy of progress in my neighborhood, in the name of Jesus.
30.    I bind the spirit of death, armed robbery and assassination in my neighborhood, in the name of Jesus.
31.    I reject, renounce and destroy every evil agreement or covenant in the environment, in the name of Jesus.
32.    By the blood of Jesus, I nullify the effects and operation of evil forces around my house, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Lord, get all my stubborn pursuers occupied with unprofitable assignments, in the name of Jesus.
34.    In Jesus' mighty name, I fire back every arrow, spiritual bullets and satanic missiles fired at me.
35.    O Lord, reveal the secrets and expose all my enemies masquerading as my friends.
36.    Father Lord, make it impossible for my enemies to use my foot marks, urine, faeces, hair, clothing, and shoes.

fields.title: POWER TO PROSPER
fields.prayers:
Confession: Psalm 34:10
Praise Worship
Prayer Points
1.    Thank God for His provision so far.
2.    Let all security-men in charge of satanic banks that are harboring my blessings be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I terminate the appointment of all satanic bankers and managers, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I command the thunder of God to break to pieces all the satanic strong-rooms harboring my properties, in Jesus' name.
5.    I possess all my properties, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Let all satanic instruments (the legal tenders and the cheque) used against me be completely destroyed, in Jesus' name.
7.    I command all satanic clearing houses and agents to be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
8.    I paralyze completely all satanic transactions and contracts against my life, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Let all satanic network and computers fashioned against me be disorganized, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Heavenly Father, let all blood that has been stored up in satanic bank come forth, in the name of Jesus.
11.    I refuse to be an object for satanic transaction, in Jesus' name.
12.    I refuse to do profitless work, in the name of Jesus.
13.    Every evil force against my handiwork, be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
14.    I send back to the sender every arrow of spiritual deposit and advance payment against my handiwork, in the name of Jesus.
15.    You my handiwork, receive divine profit, in the name of Jesus.
16.    I cover my handiwork with the fire of God, in the name of Jesus.
17.    I cover my handiwork with hot coals of fire, untouchable for evil forces, in the name of Jesus.
18.    O Lord, put to shame every evil force that is against my handiwork.
19.    My handiwork, receive the touch of the Lord, in Jesus' name.
20.    Every tree of profitless hard work, be uprooted, in Jesus' name.
21.    Profitless hard-work, pack your load and go out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
22.    I will not carry any evil load forward in my life, in Jesus' name.
23.    O Lord, drain out satanic deposits from my business and handiwork.
24.    Let all the strange hands and legs walk out of my business and handiwork, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Let the spirit of favour fall upon me now, in the name of Jesus.
26.    O Lord, enlarge my coast.
27.    I rebuke every devourer in my handiwork, in the name of Jesus.
28.    O Lord, cause ministering angels to bring in customers and money into my business.
29.    I bind every spirit of error, in the name of Jesus.
30.    Let every trouble emanating from envious business partners be rendered null and void, in the name of Jesus.
31.    O Lord, surprise me with abundance in every area of my life.
32.    I command a quit notice to evil legs on finances, in the name of Jesus.
33.    Let the anointing for money-yielding ideas fall upon my life, in the name of Jesus.
34.    I bind every spirit of fake and useless investment, in Jesus' name.
35.    I command every effect of strange money on my business to be neutralized, in the name of Jesus.
36.    Father Lord, let all satanic hosts against my prosperity receive blindness and commotion, in the name of Jesus.
37.    All hindrances to my prosperity, be electrocuted, in Jesus' name.
38.    Let all my mistakes be converted to miracles and testimonies, in the name of Jesus.
39.    I command all those who vow to hinder my prosperity to somersault, become naked and confess to death, in Jesus' name.
40.    I command all my buried blessings to be exhumed, in Jesus' name.
41.    Father Lord, use both white and black men to bless me, in the name of Jesus.
42.    I command all my pounds sterling and dollars' miracles to locate me, in the name of Jesus.
43.    All my blessings attached to my place of birth, be released, in the name of Jesus.
44.    Father Lord, use all the people in my environment to bless me and let anointing of prosperity fall on me, in the name of Jesus.
45.    Lord, by the power of the blood, remove from my life any hindrance of the enemy.
46.    O Lord, drive away all darkness in every area of my life.
47.    O Lord, shield me from all forms of deception.
48.    O Lord, illuminate Your truth to my understanding.
49.    Lord, let me, with the eyes of my heart, see You clearly.
50.    Lord, take away from me all powers do not originate from You.
51.    I separate myself from Satan and his kingdom, in Jesus' name.
52.    I renounce the kingdom of darkness in the name of Jesus

fields.title: WALLS OF JERICHO, THOU BE DESTROYED
fields.prayers:
Praise Worship                                 
Confession: Zechariah 4:7
Prayer Points
1.    Sing songs of praises unto God for how far He has helped you in the journey of your life.
2.    Begin to cover yourself, household and properties with the blood of Jesus.
3.    Every spirit of limitation against my breakthroughs, die, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every power of demotion targeted against my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every spirit, power and personality working against my elevation, die, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I receive to carry the evil-left over of my family, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Every evil standing order against my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every ancestral curse working against my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.    O God arise and begin to disgrace all my Goliaths, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Let my Pharaoh die in his own Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
11.    I fire back every arrow of spiritual demotion, in the name of Jesus.
12.    I fire back every arrow of physical demotion, in the name of Jesus.
13.    I fire back every arrow of financial demotion, in the name of Jesus.
14.    I fire back every arrow of marital demotion, in the name of Jesus.
15.    O Lord, begin to laugh my enemies to scorn.
16.    Every power preventing me from enjoying the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living, die, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Let God be God in my life, in the name of Jesus.
18.    Let God be over my battles, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Oh God arise and fight for me in my dreams, in the name of Jesus.
20.    In the presence of those who think I'm nobody, Oh God arise, and make me somebody, in the name of Jesus.
21.    In the presence of those who are asking for my God, oh God arise and manifest Yourself, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Oh Lord, make my life a bethel, in the name of Jesus.
23.    Every pattern of poverty will not prosper in my life, in the name of Jesus.
24.    Let the rivers of breakthroughs flow into my life, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Poverty, you will not locate my life, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Angels of blessing, what are you waiting for, locate me now, in the name it of Jesus.
27.    I pull down every altar of serpent in my life, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Oh Lord, arise and destroy every spiritual marriage prepared for my life, in the name of Jesus.
29.    I shall not be a victim of spiritual marriage, in the mighty name of Jesus.
30.    Oh Lord, destroy the plans of spiritual marriage against my life, in the name of Jesus.
31.    You spirit of death and hell, I am not your candidate, in the name of Jesus.
32.    Tragedy, you shall not locate me, in the name of Jesus
33.    I reject death, I claim abundant life, in the name of Jesus.
34.    Every power, planning to wage war against my divine vision, what are you waiting for, die in the name of Jesus.
35.    Every power, that refuses to let me go, what are you waiting for die, in the name of Jesus.
36.    My life, move from minimum to maximum, in the name of Jesus.
37.    Whether the enemy likes it or not, I shall not serve my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
38.    My sun shall shine, in the name of Jesus.
39.    Every cloud of confusion, covering my divine goal, clear, in the name of Jesus.
40.    My divine goal, locate me by fire, in the name of Jesus.
41.    Every generational curse affecting my divine goal, break by the blood of Jesus.
42.    Every evil meeting summoned against my goal, I scatter you by fire, in the name of Jesus.
43.    Every power caging my divine goal, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
44.    Anointing to excel, fall upon me now, in the name of Jesus.
45.    As from now on, I shall prevail against the enemies of my breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
46.    Finger of God, write my name in the book of success, in the name of Jesus.
47.    Every enemy of my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
48.    Every enemy of my marriage, die, in the name of Jesus.
49.    Every enemy of God for my breakthroughs, die, in the name of Jesus.
50.    Begin to thank God.

fields.title: MILITARY ASSAULT AGAINST THE STRONG MAN
fields.prayers:
Praise worship                
Scripture Reading - 1 Samuel 17
Confessions - Isaiah 49:25-26
 PRAYER POINTS
1.    Every garment of bondage, catch fire, in the name of Jesus.
2.    O God arise and catapult me to a greater tomorrow, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Thunder of God, arise, waste my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every tree planted in my life by the strongman, die, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Strongman of poverty, assigned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
6.    Every power delaying my success, die, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Every power hindering my progress, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every strongman frustrating my breakthroughs, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every strongman blocking my chances, die, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Every strongman diverting my blessings, die, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Every power destroying my business and blocking my opportunities, die, in the name of Jesus.
12.  To every strongman in charge of my case, I invade your domain and put you under arrest, in Jesus name.
13.  I pull you down to zero level and I bind you with fetters of iron, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Receive fire and brimstone after the order of Sodom and Gomorrah, in the name of Jesus.
15.  I trample upon you, in the name of Jesus.
16.  I come as a strongman against you and I overpower you with the blood of Jesus, in the name of Jesus.
17.  I seize your weapons and smash them to irreparable pieces, in the name of Jesus.
18.  I recover my stolen goods from you, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Net of dark powers, release me, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Power of the wicked avenger upon my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Blood of Jesus, neutralize any evil blood of my parents in me, in the name of Jesus.
22.  Every evil hand disturbing the program of God for my life, catch fire, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Every battle acquired from my father’s house, die, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Pillar of demotion, break, in the name of Jesus.
25.  Every power that does not want to let me go, Lord, visit them with the ten plagues of Egypt, in Jesus name.
26.  Every contrary wind assigned against me, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Every utterance from any shrine working against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Calvary covenant, arise by fire, scatter every negative covenant afflicting my life, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Any seal of darkness upon my life, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Every problem assigned to ridicule me, die, in the name of Jesus.
31.  The mighty and the terrible assigned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Witchcraft decisions on my destiny, expire, in the name of Jesus.
33.  I shot down any spiritual gunmen assigned against me, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Every strongman resident in the heaven over my head, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
35.  I recover seven-fold, everything that the strongman has stolen from me, in the name of Jesus.
36.  Power to break the power of the strongman, fall upon me now, in the name of Jesus.
37.  O thou that troubleth the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
38.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
39.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
40.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: STAGNANCY MUST DIE
fields.prayers:
Prayer Points
1.    Thank God for what He has done for you this year.
2.    Let frustration and disappointment, be the portion of every object fashioned against my life and family, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every tie to polluted objects and items between my life and family, break, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every unspoken curse against my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every curse pronounced inwardly against my destiny, break, in the name of Jesus.
6.    You inward curses, militating against my virtues, break, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Any power given the mandate to curse and hinder y progress, summersault and die, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Let every spirit of Balaam hired to curse my progress, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every curse that I have brought into my life through ignorance and disobedience, break by fire, in the name of Jesus.
10.    Every power magnetizing physical and spiritual curses to me, I raise the blood of Jesus against you and I challenge you by fire, in the name of Jesus.
11.    Father, Lord, turn all my self-imposed curses to blessings, in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every instrument, put in place to frustrate me become impotent, in the name of Jesus.
13.    I reject every cycle of frustration, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Every agent assigned to frustrate me, perish by fire, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Every power tormenting Nigeria, die by the sword, in the name of Jesus.
16.    I destroy the power of every satanic arrest in my life, in the name of Jesus.
17.    All satanic-arresting agents, release me in the mighty name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
18.    Everything that is representing me in the demonic world against my career, be destroyed by the fire of God, in the name of Jesus.
19.    Spirit of the living God, quicken the whole of my being, in the name of Jesus.
20.    God, smash me and renew my strength, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Holy Spirit, open my eyes to see beyond the visible to the invisible, in the name of Jesus.
22.    Lord, ignite my career with Your fire.
23.    O Lord, liberate my spirit to follow the leading of the Holy Spirit.
24.    Holy Spirit, teach me to pray through problems instead of praying about, it in the name of Jesus.
25.    O Lord, deliver me from the lies I tell myself.
26.    Every evil spiritual padlock and evil chain hindering my success, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
27.    I rebuke every spirit of spiritual deafness and blindness in my life, in the name of Jesus.
28.    O Lord, empower me to resist satan that he would flee.
29.    I chose to believe the report of the Lord and no other, in the name of Jesus.
30.    Lord, anoint my eyes and my ears that they may see and hear wondrous things from heaven.
31.    O Lord, anoint me to pray without ceasing.
32.    In the name of Jesus, I capture every power behind any career failure.
33.    Holy Spirit, rain on me now, in the name of Jesus.
34.    Holy Spirit, uncover my darkest secrets, in the name of Jesus.
35.    You spirit of confusion, loose your hold over my life, in the name of Jesus.
36.    In the power of the Holy Spirit, I defy satan's power upon my career, in the name of Jesus.
37.    Let water of life flush out every unwanted stranger in my life, in the name of Jesus.
38.    You the enemies of my career, be paralyzed, in the name of Jesus.
39.    O Lord, begin to clean away from my life all that does not reflect You.
40.    Holy Spirit fire, ignite me to the glory of God, in the name of Jesus.
41.    Oh Lord, let the anointing of the Holy Spirit break every yoke of backwardness in my life.
42.    I frustrate every demonic arrest over my spirit-man, in the name of Jesus.
43.    Let the blood of Jesus remove any unprogressive label from every aspect of my life, in Jesus' name.
44.    Anti-breakthrough decrees, be revoked, in the name of Jesus.
45.    Holy Ghost fire, destroy every satanic garment in my life, in the name of Jesus.
46.    Begin to thank God.

fields.title: HOLY SPIRIT, INCREASE MY SPEED & REWARD MY EFFORTS
fields.prayers:
Praise Worship
 
Confession:
Isaiah 61:1-3 says, "The Spirit of the Lord God is upon me; because the Lord hath anointed me to preach good tidings unto the meek; he hath sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim liberty to the captives, and the opening of the prison to them that are bound; [2] To proclaim the acceptable year of the Lord, and the day of vengeance of our God; to comfort all that mourn; [3] To appoint unto them that mourn in Zion, to give unto them beauty for ashes, the oil of joy for mourning, the garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness; that they might be called trees of righteousness, the planting of the Lord, that he might be glorified." 

Prayer Points
1.    My life will not be ruled by fear of what anyone can do to me, in the name of Jesus.
2.    0h Lord, save me from myself.
3.    I shall not die inwardly, in the name of Jesus.
4.    0h Lord, let me be lost in You.
5.    I release myself from every bondage of fear, in Jesus' name.
6.    0h Lord, crucify . . . (put your own name).
7.    0h Lord, remember me as You remembered the man dying next to You at the cross, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Holy Spirit, possess me completely, in the name of Jesus.
9.    My Father, transform me in the fire of Your love, in Jesus' name
10.    0h Lord, divorce me from every sin of self.
11.    Thou power of God, clear away my inner rubbish, in Jesus' name.
12.    0h Lord, break me and mold me according to Your will.
13.    0h Lord, use my life to bless many, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Father Lord, let me experience Your kingdom in every department of my life, in the name of Jesus.
15.    0h Lord, make my life a garden in which You can work in the world, in the name of Jesus.
16.    My flesh, I command you to die to sin, in Jesus' name.
17.    0h Lord, fill me with the spirit of healing and peace, in Jesus' name.
18.    Every enemy of brokenness in my life, depart, in the name of Jesus.
19.    0h Lord, let the Holy Ghost fire set my whole heart on fire, in the name of Jesus.
20.    I paralyze all my Delilah, in the name of Jesus.
21.    Oh Lord, let me be a channel of blessings to others, in Jesus' name.
22.    Oh, thou that troubles the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
23.     Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
24.     O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
25.     Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: AVENGE ME OF MY ADVERSARIES
fields.prayers:
Scripture Reading: Luke 18:1-7
Confession: Psalm 18:1-47
Prayer Points
1.    Praise the Lord because the gates of hell shall not prevail against His Church.
2.    Thank the Lord for His promises that are yea and Amen.
3.    Thank the Lord for purchasing victory for us with His Blood.
4.    The Lord should turn me into hot coals of untouchable fire.
5.    I command every form of demonic family bondage to break in Jesus name.
6.    I lose myself from the hold and influence of every ancestral in Jesus name.
7.    I command every bad spiritual deposit in my life to be melted away by the fire of the holy Ghost.
8.    I bind all the suckers of peace and happiness in my house in Jesus name.
9.    I retrieve my blood or any other material from my body from every evil altar.
10.    I lose myself from every linkage to any family idol in Jesus name
11.    I bind every spirit of infirmity in the name of Jesus
12.    Let every tongue contrary to my peace be permanently silenced in the name of Jesus.
13.    Let every altar of witchcraft, familiar spirits and false religion be broken in this country in Jesus name.
14.    Let every evil imagination against me fail woefully in Jesus name.

fields.title: HEAL ME, SAVE ME
fields.prayers:
Scripture Reading: Proverbs 4
Confession: Jeremiah 17:14
Prayer points
1.    Give thanks as the Holy Spirit leads you.
2.    Lord, cleanse me from every filthiness of the spirit.
3.    The Lord should promote me from minimum to maximum in all spheres of my life in Jesus name.
4.    I shall not labour in vain nor bring forth for trouble in the name of Jesus.
5.    Every good thing that my hands have laid its foundation shall be completed by my hands in Jesus name.
6.    I shall find favour in my going out and coming in the name of Jesus
7.    I reject and denounce every spirit of failure
8.    Lord, let holiness unto you be my watchword and my lot in the name of Jesus
9.    I overthrow the citadel of sickness, weakness and fear in my life in the name of Jesus.
10.    Let me be transfused with the Blood of the Lord Jesus Christ.
11.    Lord, clothe me with the mantle of fire in Jesus name
12.    I reject every spiritual invitation to oppressors in my body in Jesus name
13.    Lord, make me your battle axe in the name of Jesus
14.    Lord, give me the grace to live in divine health.

fields.title: DECREE BREAKTHROUGH IN YOUR ENDEAVORS
fields.prayers:
Scripture Reading: Lamentation 3                                           
Confession: Psalm 16:6
Prayer points
1.    Thank God for His unfailing love.
2.    The Lord should open up the pipeline of prosperity into my handiwork and my business in the name of Jesus.
3.     I bind every spirit of financial failure in the name of Jesus.
4.    Lord, loose the spirit of prosperity upon me in the name of Jesus.
5.     O Lord anoint me with the power to prosper in the name of Jesus.
6.     Lord, give me breakthrough of blessings in the spiritual, financial, marital and business life in Jesus name.
7.    I declare this year a year of super abundance for me in the name of Jesus.
8.     Let the Holy Spirit take perfect control of my tongue in the name of Jesus.
9.     Lord, give me the grace to express Your love to the needy in the name of Jesus.
10.    I command every contrary tree growing in my life to be uprooted and thrown into the fire in Jesus name.
11.     O Lord, rain abundant blessings upon me in Jesus name.
12.     Lord, make this program the beginning of great blessings in the name of Jesus.
13.     From the North, South, East and the West, let all my blessings be released and let them come unto me in Jesus name.
14.     I decree that my stolen blessings should be restored seven-folds in Jesus name.
15.     Let every evil attachment to my place of birth be disrupted in the name of Jesus.
16.    I command every agent acting against my breakthroughs to be permanently paralysed in the name of Jesus.
17.     I command every power barking against my progress to be silenced in the name of Jesus.
18.     I receive the anointing for supernatural breakthroughs in all my endeavors in the name of Jesus.
19. I receive the anointing of the beautiful feet and the prospering hand in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PRAYERS FOR DIVINE ELEVATION
fields.prayers:
Confessions: Psalm 75:6-7, Numbers 22:7, Deut. 28:13
PRAYER POINTS
1.    Praise the Lord
2.    I reject every journey to backwardness in the name of Jesus.
3.    I paralyze every strongman assigned to this institution in the name of Jesus.
4.    Let every agent of shame working against me be paralyzed in the name of Jesus.
5.    I paralyze the activities of household wickedness over my life in the name of Jesus.
6.    I quench every strange fire emanating from evil tongues against me in the name of Jesus.
7.    Lord, give me power for maximum achievement in this place in the name of Jesus.
8.    Oh Lord, give me the confronting authority to achieve effortless results in the name of "Jesus.
9.    Lord, fill me with wisdom like an angel in the name of Jesus.
10.    I break every curse of unfruitfulness placed upon my life in the name of Jesus.
11.    I break every curse of untimely death in the name of Jesus.
12.    Lord, fortify me with your power in the name of Jesus
13.    Let the counter-movement of the Holy Spirit frustrate every evil device against me in the name of Jesus.
14.    Father Lord, give me tongue of the learned.
15.    Lord, make my voice the voice of peace, deliverance, power and solution in the name of Jesus.
16.    Lord, give me divine direction that will propel this institution to greatness through me, in the name of Jesus.
17.    Every power assigned, to use my family/job to torment me be paralyzed in the name of Jesus.
18.    Lord Jesus, give me an excellent spirit.
19.    Thank God for answered prayers

fields.title: PRAYERS TO REVOKE EVIL DEDICATIONS
fields.prayers:
1.    I confess the sins of my ancestors (list them)
2.    Ask the Lord for forgiveness.
3.    Let the power in the blood of Jesus separate me from sins of my ancestors.
4.    I renounce any evil dedication placed upon my life in the name of Jesus.
5.    I break every evil edict and ordination in the name of Jesus.
6.    I renounce and loose myself from every negative dedication placed upon my life   in the name of Jesus.
7.    I command all demons associated with the dedication to leave now in the name of Jesus Christ.
8.    I take authority over all the associated curses in Jesus name.
9.    Lord, cancel the evil consequences of any broken demonic promise or dedication.
10.    I take authority over all the curses emanating from broken dedication in the name of Jesus.
11. I command all demons associated with any broken evil parental vow and dedication to depart from me now in Jesus name

fields.title: PRAYERS TO REVOKE EVIL DEDICATIONS
fields.prayers:
1.    I confess the sins of my ancestors (list them)
2.    Ask the Lord for forgiveness.
3.    Let the power in the blood of Jesus separate me from sins of my ancestors.

10.    I take authority over all the curses emanating from broken dedication in the name of Jesus.
11.    I command all demons associated with any broken evil parental vow and dedication to depart from me now in Jesus name.

fields.title: POWER TO OBTAIN PROFITABLE EMPLOYMENT INSTRUCTIONS
fields.prayers:
Repent from all known sins.
1.    Find out scriptures that promise you what you desire.
2.    Memorize and meditate on these scriptures and feed constantly on them as they promise you victory.
3.    Quote these scriptures against Satan, worry, anxiety, fear and negative circumstances.
4.    Ask the father in the name of Jesus for the desire of your heart. Believe that you have already received.
5.    Resolve not to allow doubt. Reject every thought of failure and doubt. Reject every dream, vision, prophecy, that tells you that your prayers are not answered.
6.    See yourself in the new position and keep confessing it.
7.    Always give thanks to God for the answer to your prayers. Confessions
Deut 28:13: And the LORD shall make thee the head, and not the tail; and thou shall be above only, and thou shalt not be beneath; if that thou harken unto the commandments of the LORD thy God, which I command thee this day, to observe and to do them.
Prov 21:1: the king's heart is in the hand of the LORD, as the rivers of water he turned it whithersoever he will.
Prov.11:27: He that diligently seeketh good procured favors; but he that seeketh mischief, it shall come unto him.
Zech 12:10: And I will pour upon the house of David, and upon the inhabitants of Jerusalem, the spirit of grace and of supplications; and they shall look upon me whom they have pierced, and they shall mourn for him, as one mourned for his only son, and shall be in bitterness for him, as one that is in bitterness for him, as one that is in bitterness for his firstborn.
Ps 8:5: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
Eph 3:19-20: And to know the love of Christ, which passed knowledge, that ye might be filled with all the fulness of God. Now unto him that is able to do exceedingly abundantly above all that we ask or think, according to the power that work thin us. fields.title: Breaking Curses
fields.prayers:
Curses are an unusual topic, but they are real. However, curses are not playthings and are profoundly emotionally disturbing for those who experience them. They are not just angry words or swear words; they are acts of power in the spiritual and physical realm. Curses are mentioned over 200 times in Scripture, and were foundational to the Old Covenant (Deuteronomy 28-30).
God Himself was the first one to pronounce curses on the earth, on Eve’s fertility, Adams destiny and upon the serpent. Curses are not just a primitive superstition; they are spiritual pronouncements recorded in Scripture, that profoundly affect the very structure of reality in some way, and are so much in great force today.
Today, we think of "cursing" as someone using foul language, profanity, or perhaps, even blasphemous words against God. Our definition usually is synonymous with "swearing." This is a form of cursing, but it is only a small portion of what curses mean in the Bible. Cursing in the Bible is not only speaking evil of someone, but evil coming upon someone. If a person is under a curse, according to the Bible, evil has come upon them in some way. Sickness, tragedy, or bad circumstances are occurring in their lives.
Breaking Stubborn Curses


Praise Worship 
Confessions 
Gal 3:13-14: Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law, being made a curse for us: for it is written, Cursed is every one that hanged on a tree: That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles through Jesus Christ; that we might receive the promise of the Spirit through faith.

Col 2:14-15: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us, which was contrary to us, and took it out of the way, nailing it to his cross; and having spoiled principalities and powers, he made a shew of them openly, triumphing over them in it.

Lord Jesus,
1.    I confess to You that I have been in bondage in the following areas (name the specific areas), and I ask You to reveal to me the cause or causes that brought this into my life. (Here, confess to the Lord whatever He brings to your mind.) I thank You for the release that You gained for me when You became a curse on the cross.
2.    I ask You to forgive me or my ancestors for any sin that has exposed me to a curse (name any specific sin that you are aware of.) I receive Your forgiveness and I choose to forgive those who've sinned against me (name these people).
3.    I break any ungodly ties that still bind me to anyone in my life who's ever hurt or disappointed me or to whom I have related in an ungodly way. (Name these people as you break the unhealthy bonding and 'soul ties'.)
4.    I renounce any and all contact with the occult and promise to destroy and occult objects that I may possess. (Name the specific occult involvement.)
5.    I renounce any and all sexual sins, and I break the power of pornography that may have a hold of me.
6.    I renounce any and all self-inflicted curses that I've pronounced on myself, and I break those patterns from my heart and tongue.
7.    I renounce any and all curses that I've spoken against others, whether knowingly or unknowingly: gossip, bitter words, anger, and judgment. I break the authority of any such occult power in my life.
8.    I renounce any and all unholy covenants in which I or my ancestors have been involved (name them).
9.    I renounce any and all patterns of stinginess with finances that I or my ancestors have engaged. I resolve to be obedient to the Lord in the area of tithes and offerings.
10.    I renounce all attitudes of reliance upon man and the flesh. I resolve to put my trust solely in the Lord, my God.
11.    I do once and for all release myself from the power and authorities of any curse.
12.    All demonic spirits and powers involved (name them if they've been discerned), I bind you and command you to cease your activity in my life and to leave my life, my body, my soul, my mind, my family, my house, my job, etc.
13.    I pray all these things in the authority of the name of Jesus and give You thanks and praise, Lord, that all these things are done.
14.    I break and cancel every inherited curse, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Lord, remove from me all the curses placed upon my ancestral families as a result of their evil associations, involvement, etc, in the name of Jesus.
16.    I break and cancel every curse placed upon me by my parents, in the name of Jesus.
17.    I break and cancel every curse, spell, hex, enchantment, bewitchment, incantation placed upon me by my involvement with evil association, in the name of Jesus.
18.    I break and revoke every blood and soul-tie covenant and yokes attached to them, in the name of Jesus.
19.    I purge myself of all the evil foods I have eaten in the evil world with the blood of Jesus and purify myself with the fire of the Holy Ghost, in the name of Jesus.

21.    I declare my body, soul and spirit a-no-go-area for all evil spirits, in the name of Jesus

14. I reject all evil manipulation and manipulators in the mighty name of Jesus.
15. I break the power of the occult, witchcraft and familiar spirit over my life in the name of Jesus.
16. I deliver and pass out any Satan deposit in my intestine in the name of Jesus.
17. I deliver and pass out any satanic deposit in my reproductive organ in the name of Jesus.
18. I deliver and pass out any satanic deposit in my womb in the name of Jesus.
19. In the name of Jesus I declare before all the forces of darkness Jesus Christ is my Lord over every department of my life.
20. Your foreign hand laid on my womb, release me in the name of Jesus.
21. In the name of Jesus I renounce break and loose myself from all (1) Demonic holds (2) Psychic powers (3) Bonds of physical illness (4) Bondage.
22. In the name of Jesus I break and loose myself from all evil curses chains spells jinx’s bewitchment, witchcraft, sorcery, which may have been put upon me.
23. Let a creative miracle take place in my womb and reproductive system in the name of Jesus.
24. Father i ask you in the name of Jesus to send out your angels and have on earth and break all evil storage vessels version against me.
25. I lose myself from every evil influence dark spirits and satanic bondage in the name of Jesus.
26. I confess and declare that my body is the temple of the Holy spirit, redeemed cleansed and sanctified by the blood of Jesus Christ
27. I bind plunder and render to naught every strong man assigned to my womb, reproductive system and marital life in the name of Jesus.
28. God who quiken the dead quicken my womb and reproductive system in the name of Jesus
29. I release myself from the hold of spirit of sterility, infertility and fear in the name of Jesus.
30. All spirits rooted in fornication come out of my womb with all your roots in the mighty name of our Lord Jesus.
31. All spirit rooted in sexual perversion come out of my womb with all your roots in the mighty name of our Lord Jesus.
32. All spirit rooted in spirit husband come out of my womb with all your roots in the name of Jesus.
33. All spirit rooted in masturbation come out of my womb with all your roots in the name of Jesus
34. All spirit rooted in guilt come out of my womb with all your roots in the name of Jesus.
35. All spirits rooted in pornography come out of my womb with all your roots in the name of Jesus
Psalm 110:3: “Your people shall be willing in the day of your power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: you have the dew of your youth.”

When the womb of Hannah spoke, the whole of Israel heard the voice of Samuel. When the womb of Sarah spoke, the generations of Abraham (including us) till date, heard the voice of Isaac, and when the womb of Mary spoke, the whole world heard and are still hearing the voice of our Lord Jesus Christ!!! Oooh womb of my destiny, open your mouth and speak forth the manifestation of my glory in Jesus name.
PSALM 3:7: “Arise, O LORD; save me, O my God: for you have smitten all my enemies on the cheek bone; you have broken the teeth of the ungodly.”
Luke 21:15: “For I will give you a mouth and wisdom, which none of your adversaries
will be able to withstand or contradict.”
ISAIAH 41:15: “Behold, I will make thee a new sharp threshing instrument HAVING TEETH: thou shalt thrash the mountains, and beat them small, and shalt make the hills as chaff.”

- I have come to understand in spiritual warfare a strange battle called “The battle of the mouths”. Your mouth is not meant for eating physical delicacies alone. Your mouth should be a consecrated altar of power! 

- Everything that thrives or dies around you should depend on the power that comes from your tongue!!! Your mouth should not be the habitation of educated lies and gossip.
Psalms 19:2-3: “Day unto day uttered speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge. There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.” 

- O Lord, speak to me through the day and let my heart delight in Your revelations in the night seasons, that I might become a Kingdom voice on the earth, in Jesus’ name.

- The belly of the midnight is pregnant with mysteries that makes for mastery on the earth. Only the midwife of midnight seasons can take delivery of the ‘knowledge-baby’ born by the midnight. The midnight is not a time of slumber, it is a time for WORD drunkards to speak mysteries into the atmosphere.

fields.title: POWER AGAINST THE SPIRIT OF KADESH BARNEA

fields.title: BATTLE CRY FOR BREAKTHROUGH
fields.prayers:
STEPS
 
1.    Praise worship
2.    Scripture Reading - Psalm 91


1. I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus.  I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me.  I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies. I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars.  They must not smite me. I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year.  This is the year the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it. I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year.  I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void.  I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus.  Spirits of favor, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in Jesus name. I shall excel this year and nothing shall defile me.  I shall posses the gates of my enemies.
2.    The Lord shall anoint me with the oil of gladness above my fellows.  The fire of the enemy shall not burn me. My ears shall hear good news and I shall not hear the voice of the enemy.  My future is secured in Christ, in the name of Jesus. God has created me to do some definite services. He has committed into my hands some assignments that He has not committed to anybody. He has not created me for nothing. I shall do good.  I shall do His work. I shall be an agent of peace. I will trust Him in whatever I do and wherever I am. I can never be thrown away or downgraded. There will be no poverty of body, soul and spirit in my life this year. The anointing of God upon my life gives me favor in the eyes of God and man all the days of my life.  I shall not labor in vain.  I shall walk this day in victory and liberty of the spirit.
3.       O Lord, keep me from leaning and relying on my own understanding and intelligence.
4.       O Lord, pull down imaginations and every high thing in my life that are not of God.
5.       O Lord, purify my lips with Your holy fire.
6.       O Lord, let my fellowship with You become greater.
7.       O Lord, enable me to become the person You created me to be.
8.       I bind all evil spirits in me or that is attacking me, in the name of Jesus.
9.       I receive the mouth and the wisdom which my adversaries are not able to resist, in Jesus’ name.
10.   I stand against every satanic operation that would hinder my prayer this year, in the name of Jesus.
11.   Satan, I refuse your involvement in my prayer life this year, in the name of Jesus.
12.   I claim the victory of the Cross for my life this year, in the name of Jesus.
13.   Every satanic foothold in my life, be dismantled by fire, in the name of Jesus.
14.   I tear down the stronghold of Satan against my life, in the name of Jesus.
15.   I smash every plan of Satan formed against me this year, in the name of Jesus.
16.   I confound every stubborn pursuer this year, in the name of Jesus.
17.   I bind every power cursing my destiny into ineffectiveness, in the name of Jesus.
18.   I strike with chaos and confusion every evil power that will siphon my blessing this year, in Jesus name
19.   I turn the evil devices of household witchcraft upside down, in the name of Jesus.
20.   I render every local satanic weapon against my life this year harmless, in the name of Jesus.
21.   I receive deliverance from the spirit of anxiety, in the name of Jesus.
22.   I grab every stubborn problem and smash it against the Rock of my salvation, in the name of Jesus.
23.   I reverse every satanic calendar for my life this year, in the name of Jesus.
24.   O thou that troubles the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble
       you today, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
26.    O God arise and uproot any thing You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
27.    Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: CHOOSING DIVINE INSURANCE
fields.prayers:
Make these confessions loud and clear - I rise above adversity and I attain new height of achievements through the power of God. The Almighty God is turning my tribulations into triumphs, failures into fortunes, set backs into successes, obstacles into opportunities, burdens into blessings. I refuse to be hampered by handicaps. I refuse to be dismayed by discouragement. I refuse to be overcome by opponents. I refuse to be defeated by disappointments. I refuse to be destroyed by disasters. I take divine insurance over disasters, tragedies, physical and spiritual accidents, injuries, infirmities and distresses, in the name of Jesus. 
       
 Praise worship
1.    Scripture Reading -Isaiah 36; 2Chron. 32
2.    Confession - Isaiah 54:17
1.         Let my mountain of opposition become my mountain of blessing, in the name of Jesus.
2.         Every Judas in my destiny wither, in the name of Jesus.
3.         Every Goliath in my destiny die, in the name of Jesus.
4.         Where others have failed, I shall succeed, in the name of Jesus.
5.         Every failure that pursued my parents I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
6.         Arrows of infirmity, disperse, scatter and disintegrate, in the name of Jesus.
7.         O Eagle of my destiny, arise, fly and shine, in the name of Jesus.
8.         Thou bulldozing power of God move me forward, in the name of Jesus.
9.         Let my destiny rebel against demotion, in the name of Jesus.
10.       Every foundation of witchcraft in my family line, die, in the name of Jesus.
11.       I shall arise no power shall put me down, in the name of Jesus.
12.       Every red sea challenging my promised land, divide, in the name of Jesus.
13.       I render every power divining against my success mad, in the name of Jesus.
14.       Let the wealth of the Gentile pursue me and overtake me, in the name of Jesus.
15.       Spirit of wisdom incubate my life, in the name of Jesus.
16.       O Lord, prove your name in my situation, in the name of Jesus.
17.       O Lord, prove your mighty power in my situation, in the name of Jesus.
18.       Any power collecting satanic power because of me, die, in the name of Jesus.
19.       Satanic blood link between me and my family break, in the name of Jesus.
20.       Altars of affliction of my father’s house, die, in the name of Jesus.
21.       My blood, depart from every evil altar, in the name of Jesus.
22.       Satanic prophets summoning my spirit, receive confusion, in the name of Jesus.
23.       Every altar of poverty, die, in the name of Jesus.
24.       Foundational altars, release my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
25.       I blow off every altar of impossibility, in the name of Jesus.
26.  O thou that troubles the Israel of Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today, in the name of Jesus.

28.       O God arise and uproot any thing You did not plant inside the Army of Jesus Christ Ministry
29.       Let the fire of revival fall upon Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PERSONAL PROPHECIES TO MOVE FORWARD
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
 
Confessions - Personalize these prophecies by confessing each prophecy seven times.
                                      
1.     I shall not extinguish the fire of the Holy Spirit.
2.     I am filled with all spiritual blessings in the heavenly places.
3.     I have resurrection power within me.
4.     My words are increasing in power and force.
5.     I possess a merry heart that doeth good like medicine.
6.     God has given me dominion.
7.     I shall cooperate with God in naming the kind of life I want to life.
8.     I am complete in the Lord Jesus Christ.
9.     I speak and think of whatever is of good report.
10.   My God shall supply all my needs according to His riches in glory.
11.   The Lord is my helper; I will not be afraid what can man do to me.
12.   The name of the Lord is a strong tower, I run into it and I am safe.
13.   I will not speak what comes to my mind but will speak what is in God’s mind.
14.   My faith comes by hearing as I listen to the Word of God.
15.   The hand of the Lord is upon me. As I prophecy great things.
16.   My inward man is renewed day by day by the power of God.
17.   My youth is renewed like the eagle. My eyes are not growing dim nor is my strength gone.
18.   I hear the sound of an abundance of the rain of blessings coming my way.
19.   I am a king; I reign in life through Jesus Christ.
20.   I live by faith and not by sight.
21.   I tread upon all serpents and scorpions; they cannot harm me.
22.   I am divinely insured, no weapon fashioned against me shall prosper.
23.   I make Jesus the great physician my doctor.
24.   I forbid Satan to put any disease in my body.
25.   The joy of the Lord is my strength.
26.   God’s word is life and health unto all my flesh.
27.   Every part of my body functions perfectly.
28.   I use the power of God to meet any need.
29.   I do not lack any good thing.
30.   I am blessed so that I can be a blessing.
31.   I refuse to be poor; Christ has redeemed me from the curse of poverty.
32.   Poverty and lack are underneath my feet.
33.   I am the head and not the tail.
34.   Wealth and riches are in my house.
35.   My faith can come under tests, but I will pass the tests.
36.   I will not become bitter towards anyone. I will pray for those who slander me.
37.    I am an overcomer because I live by faith and not by sight.
38.    God has not given me the spirit of fear, but of power, love and a sound mind.
39.    I have mountain-moving faith, I speak to mountains and they obey me.
40.    I do not fear the future because I trust in God.
41.    I am the property of the Lord Jesus Christi.
42.    I dwell in the secret place of the most high.
43.    The power of God is in me and no foe can withstand me.
44.    The angels of the Lord encamp me and deliver me from every evil work.
45.   I am redeemed from the curse of sickness and I refuse to accept its symptoms.
46.   No evil shall befall me, neither shall any plaque or calamity come near my dwelling.
47.   The word of God is medication and life to my flesh.
48.   I put on the whole armour of God and the shield of faith protects me from the fiery darts of the wicked.
49.   God keeps all my bones and not one of them is broken.
50.   God redeems my soul from the power of the grave.
51.   I have life and, in my pathway, there is no death.
52.   I am released from the bondage of the fear of death.
53.   I cast my cares upon the Lord because He cares for me.
54.   I have the glorious divine inheritance working inside of me.
55.   I reject every tradition that does not conform to the Word of God.
56.   I shall not utter words that would disrespect God’s authority.
57.   I shall breakthrough not break down.
58.   The world shall read of my rising and not of my falling.
59.   I shall not roam aimlessly in the market square of life.
60.   I will not drink the water of affliction.
61.   My David, arise and kill your Goliath.
62.   I make God’s word my words.
63.   I will walk in love and by faith in God’s word.
64.   All things are possible with God and I choose to believe in Him.
65.   I release Christ in me, the hope of glory.
66.   I have the keys of the kingdom of God, whatever I bind is bound in heaven, whatever I loose is loosed in heaven.
67.   My success is not dependent on luck or chance; it has to do with Jesus.
68.   I shall not die but live to declare the glory of God.
69.   I am following God’s plan for my life.
70.   I shall not be hindered by disappointments and discouragements.
71.   O thou that troubles the Israel of Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today, in the name of Jesus.
72.   Every enemy of Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, scatter, in the name of Jesus.

24.    Any power redirecting my star, die, in the name of Jesus.
25.    Any night animal assigned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
26.    Anyone staying awake to do me harm, receive angelic slap, in the name of Jesus.
27.    Any power transforming into animals in the night against me, I trap you in your body, in the name of Jesus.
28.    Any power of the night tampering with my organ, die, in the name of Jesus.
29.    Every strange touch of evil power, blood of Jesus, wash them off.
30.    Any night bird ordained to cry against my prosperity, die, in the name of Jesus.
31.    Any material carved against me, attack your manufacturer, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DEALING WITH LUCIFERIAN NIGHT MARAUDERS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Matthew 13
Confession - Isaiah 49:24-26
 Prayer Points
1.       Father, I thank You, for opening my understanding to behold wondrous things from Your law.
2.         Father, I thank You, for not allowing the enemies to devour my life.
3.         Bring quality repentance unto the Lord.
4.         Any evil thing planted in my life, by the powers of darkness, come out now, in the name of Jesus.
5.         Thou power of the night, release my virtues, in the name of Jesus.
6.         Every twin substitute in the spirit, stealing from my destiny, loose your hold, in the name of Jesus.
7.         Every satanic farmer, targeting my life, I command you to fail, in the name of Jesus.
8.         O God arise, and let every power of the night working against my destiny scatter, in the name of Jesus.
9.         Every cage of witchcraft, targeted against me, be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
10.       Every habitation of humiliation and disgrace, fashioned against me, be shattered by the power of God.
11.       Every tree that the Father has not planted in my life, be uprooted by fire, in the name of Jesus.
12.       O God arise, and give me the very best You can do for me, in the name of Jesus.
13.       My Father, make my life an amazement to my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
14.       My glory, reject evil exchange and transfer, in the name of Jesus.
15.       Thou power of evil spiritual marriage, die, in the name of Jesus.
16.       Every Goliath in my dream, be wasted, in the name of Jesus.
17.       Let my name become hot coals of fire that cannot be summoned by any power of darkness, in Jesus name.
18.       My Father, move me from where I am to where You want me to be, in the name of Jesus.
19.       Every problem programmed into my life in the dream, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
20.       Anything I have eaten from the table of the devil, be vomited, in the name of Jesus.
21.       Holy Ghost fire, disconnect me from every arrow of darkness, in the name of Jesus.
22.       Every evil cycle affecting my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
23.       My Father, I shall not fail You, in the name of Jesus.
24.       I bind and cast out, every spirit of slumber, in the name of Jesus.
25.       I overthrow every altar of powerlessness, in the name of Jesus.
26.       I shall not sleep on my mountain of transfiguration, in the name of Jesus.
27.       I cancel every satanic negotiation over my destiny while I was asleep, in the name of Jesus.
28.       Every affliction of the night, my life is not your candidate, in the name of Jesus.
29.       I decree that sleep and slumber shall not have dominion over me, in the name of Jesus.
30.       Every assignment of the enemy to make me sleep when danger is near, be frustrated, in the name of Jesus.
31.       Earthquake of deliverance, arise every night, and pursue my pursuers, in the name of Jesus.
32.       I shall not be a victim of the terror of the night and the pestilence that walks in darkness, in the name of Jesus.
33.       O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
34.       Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
35.       O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
36.       Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DELIVERANCE BY THE DIVINE EAGLE
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Acts 16:25-40
Confessions - Isaiah 40:28-31
Make these confessions loud and clear:       I am an eagle of God. My wings shall not be clipped by any evil power, I refuse to be caged by frustration, disappointments, destructive habits, worldliness, carelessness, prayerlessness and dark powers, in the name of Jesus. Whether the enemy likes it or not, the eagle of my destiny shall fly. I overthrow every establishment delegated to cage my destiny. The Spirit of the living God shall come upon me and I shall become a new person.
Bring quality repentance unto the Lord
 
PRAYER POINTS
 
1.      O eagle of my destiny, arise by fire and confuse my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
2.      Every cage of limitation be broken by the power of God, in the name of Jesus.
3.      Every root of failure in my life I sentence you to death, in the name of Jesus.
4.      My hidden glory and virtues, manifest, in the name of Jesus.
5.      Every serpent and scorpion anointed against my destiny, dry up and die, in the name of Jesus.
6.      Every power writing the obituary of my destiny fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
7.      I overrule every witchcraft decision taken against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
8.      I refuse to be a negative example, in the name of Jesus.
9.      Power to outshine and excel, fall upon me, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Every evil cycle, causing repeated problems for me, break, in the name of Jesus.
11.  My Father, set for me a table of promotion in the presence of my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
12.  Thou power of God, tear away every garment of shame assigned against me, in the name of Jesus.
13.  My Father, put a mark on my forehead to qualify me for signs and wonders, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Every power, limiting my potentials, face the anger of the finger of God, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Every enemy of my divinely appointed time, be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
16.  Ever strongman that must die for my breakthrough to manifest, die, in the name of Jesus.
17.  O mountains, that boast against me, be shattered by the power of God, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Every fountain of bitterness flowing against my life, dry up and die, in the name of Jesus.
19.  My star, be invisible in the spirit realm to every dark observer, in the name of Jesus.
20.  My glory, reject the handwriting of darkness, arise and shine, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Every evil power of my fathers house, designed to cage my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
22.  I command every stronghold of darkness in my body to dry up, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Every agenda of affliction for my destiny, dry up and die, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Every power wasting my divine opportunities, be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
25.  I disallow the establishment of any curse upon my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
26.  I receive the anointing to overcome every power of failure, in the name of Jesus.
27. O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
28. Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
29. O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
30. Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: DELIVERANCE OF THE PREY OF THE MIGHTY (1)
fields.prayers:
(Isa. 49:25-26)
PRAISE WORSHIP
SCRIPTURE READING - 1Chron. 4:9-10
CONFESSIONS - Psalm 71:21  
These are destiny changing prayers. There are ten reasons why you should pray them with holy madness.
1.         God has a plan for your life.
2.         Right now, you are either in that plan or out of it.
3.         You are not an experiment or an accident.
4.         God knew who you were before your mother and father ever brought you into the world.
5.         If you do not take hold of your destiny, guard and protect it, you will lose it.
6.         There is a conspiracy and battle going on to steal destinies.
7.         There is a department in the dark world that destroys destinies.
8.         When vision is lost, people do not pursue their destinies.
9.         When there is no vision, there is no destiny.
10.       To every man or woman of destiny, there is a conspiracy in the heavenlies.
 
PRAYER POINTS:
1.         I come against destiny killers by the resurrection power of the Lord Jesus Christ, in the name of Jesus.
2.         I enforce and effect God’s original plan and purpose for my life, in the name of Jesus.
3.         I decree that no spiritual and organizational weapon formed against my destiny shall prosper, in Jesus name.
4.         I pull down the strongholds and cast down the imaginations working against my breakthroughs, in Jesus name.
5.         Anointing that breaks the yoke, break every yoke over my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
6.         I establish barricades against the enemies of my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
7.         I overrule every satanic sanction that opposes my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
8.         I dispossess spiritual destiny robbers, in the name of Jesus.
9.         Let the angels of fire handle any satanic contentions against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
10.       Let terror strike the hearts of the enemies of my destiny and cause their hearts to fail, in the name of Jesus.
11.       My Father, contend with those who contend against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
12.       My Father, arise with Your weapons of war and overthrow the chariots, horses and riders militating against my destiny.
13.       O Lord, establish my name in the heavens and let strangers submit themselves to me, in the name of Jesus.
14.       My Father, impose my divine destiny over all satanic contentions, in the name of Jesus.
15.       I bind every satanic surveillance over my life, in the name of Jesus.
16.       I dismantle every satanic harassment targeted against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
17.       My life, open to divine deliverance, in the name of Jesus.
18.       My genes, receive deliverance from inherited problems, in the name of Jesus.
19.       Every power of my father’s house, acting as a doorkeeper to my soul, die, in the name of Jesus.
20.       Blood of Jesus, make it impossible for the enemy to track down my star in the realms of the spirit, in the name    of Jesus.
21.       My Father, expose my masquerading enemies by fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.       My Father, empower me to increase in skill and understanding, in the name of Jesus.
23.       All visible and invisible walls against my destiny, break, in the name of Jesus.
24.       I execute divine judgment against every demonic activity militating against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
25.       I operate according to God’s divine timetable and calendar, in the name of Jesus.
26.       I decree that God’s agenda is my agenda, in the name of Jesus.
27.       Every witchcraft prayer targeted against my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
28.       My Father, cast forth lightening to scatter every enemy of my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
29.       I decree that nobility and greatness is my portion, in the name of Jesus.
30.       Every satanic intelligence, working against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
31.       Every good thing prepared for me before the foundation of the earth, locate me, in the name of Jesus.
32.       Thou power of darkness, cough out and vomit my virtues, in the name of Jesus.
33.       The sons of strangers shall build up my wall and kings shall minister unto me, in the name of Jesus.
34.       The timetable of my favor shall not be frustrated, in the name of Jesus.
35.       We cover the coming MFM convention with the blood of Jesus and we pray that the Lord will manifest His            power, in Jesus’ name.
36.       O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
37.       Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
38.       O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
39.       Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

37.    O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.

fields.title: FIGHTING LIKE THE PSALMIST
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading – 1 Samuel 17
Confessions:   Nahum 1:7-8 says, “The Lord is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him. [8] But with an overrunning flood he will make an utter end of the place thereof, and darkness shall pursue his enemies.”
                              
 PRAYER POINTS
1.    Lead me, O Lord in thy righteousness in the name of Jesus.
2.        O Lord, make your way plain before my face, in Jesus' name.
3.        Let my enemies fall by their own counsel, in the name of Jesus.
4.        Cast out my enemies in the multitude of their transgressions, in the name of Jesus.
5.        Every organized worker of iniquity, depart from me, in the name of Jesus.
6.        Let all my enemies be ashamed and sore vexed, in Jesus' name.
7.        Let sudden shame be the lot of all my oppressors, in Jesus' name
8.        Every power planning to tear my soul like a lion, be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
9.        O God, command judgment on all my oppressors, in Jesus' name.
10.    Let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end, 0 Lord, in the name of Jesus.
11.    O Lord, let your anger boil against the wicked every day, in the name of Jesus.
12.    O God, prepare the instruments of death against my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
13.    O God, ordain your arrows against my persecutors, in the name of Jesus.
14.    Let every pit dug by the enemy become a grave for the enemy, in the name of Jesus.
15.    Let the mischief of my enemies return upon his own head, in the name of Jesus.
16.    Let all weapons of my enemies’ backfire by thunder, in the name of Jesus.
17.  O God, ordain strength for me and still the enemy and the avenger, in the name of Jesus
18.  When mine enemies are turned back, they shall perish out of Thy presence, in the name of Jesus.
19.  O God, destroy the wicked and put out their name for ever and ever, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Let the enemy sink in the pit they have made, in Jesus' name.
21.  Let the feet of the enemy be taken in the net which he hid, in the name of Jesus.
22.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
23.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
24.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
25.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.
