fields.title: MY YEAR OF MULTIPLE HONOURS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship                                            
Scripture Reading - Psalm 91
Confession:
1.      I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus. I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me. I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies.  I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars. They must not smite me. I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year. This is the year the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it. I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year. I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void. I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus. Spirits of favour, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in the name of Jesus. I shall excel this year and nothing shall defile me. I shall posses the gates of my enemies.
2.      The Lord shall anoint me with the oil of gladness above my fellows.  The fire of the enemy shall not burn me. My ears shall hear good news and I shall not hear the voice of the enemy. My future is secured in Christ, in the name of Jesus. God has created me to do some definite services. He has committed into my hands some assignments which He has not committed to anybody. He has not created me for nothing.  I shall do good. I shall do His work.  I shall be an agent of peace.  I will trust Him in whatever I do and wherever I am. I can never be thrown away or downgraded. There will be no poverty of body, soul and spirit in my life this year.  The anointing of God upon my life gives me favour in the eyes of God and man all the days of my life. I shall not labor in vain. I shall walk this year in victory and liberty of the spirit.
3.      My Father, connect with the people that matter this year, in Jesus' name.
4.      My Father, order my steps this year, let me be at the right place at the right time to meet the right people, in the name of Jesus.
5.      I declare this year a year of complete victory over all evil forces and negative circumstances, in the name of Jesus.
6.      0 God, arise and contempt with all those that contempt with me this year, in the name of Jesus.
7.      Every obstacle on way of breakthrough this year, I pull you down, in Jesus' name
8.      By the power in the blood of Jesus, I exclude myself and my family from the agenda of Satan this year, in the name of Jesus.
9.      This year, I stir up chaos and riot in the camp of my enemies, in Jesus' name.
10.  I declare this year a year of multiple financial breakthroughs, in Jesus' name.
11.  My Father, lift me up to the higher level of service this year, in Jesus' name.
12.  My Father, let the anointing and power of the Holy Spirit rest upon me heavily this year, in the name of Jesus.
13.  I declare this year a year of fresh fire for me spiritually, in the name of Jesus.
14.  This year, I will be a prayer Eagle, in the name of Jesus.
15.     Any power that has targeted my dream life this year, I bury you alive, in the name of Jesus.
16.     The Lord is my shepherd this year, I shall not want, the spirit of lack shall not cage me, in the name of Jesus.
17.     I shall not die but live to declare the works of the Lord, in the land of the living, in the name of Jesus.
18.     My Father, let Your security angels encamp around me anywhere I go this year, in the name of Jesus.
19.     I proclaim that I will be above only, and not beneath this year, in Jesus' name.
20.     This year, I shall mount up with wings as Eagles, in the name of Jesus.
21.     This year, I will trample upon serpent and scorpion and they will not be able to harm me, in the name of Jesus.
22.     Everywhere I turn this year, the devil and his angels shall flee in terror, in the name of Jesus.
23.     No weapon of death, tragedy or disaster will prosper over my life this year, in the name of Jesus.
24.     My Father, I receive power to remain under the shadow of the Almighty throughout this year, in the name of Jesus.
25.     I declare that this year, my dwelling place and work are not for robbers and fire, in the name of Jesus.
26.     This year, the storm of life will not sweep me away, in the name of Jesus.
27.     Any animal that is under any demonic control, to harm me, physically and spiritually, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
28.     I cover myself and my family with the blood of Jesus, throughout this year, in the name of Jesus.
29.     I prophesy and declare that I shall not loose any good thing this year, in the name of Jesus.
30.     I declare that throughout this year, I shall not waste my money in hospital or drugs, in the name of Jesus.
31.     The Lord will increase my greatness and comfort me on every side this year, in the name of Jesus.
32.     All the financial miracles that eluded me last year, shall locate me this year, in the name of Jesus.
33.     0 thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
34.     Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus' name.
35.     0 God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
36.     Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: POWER FOR UNCHANGEABLE PROGRESS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship 
Scripture Reading - Judges 6
Confession - Psalm 48:14

 
PRAYER POINTS:
1.    Every satanic intelligence, working against my destiny, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
2.    Every good thing prepared for me before the foundation of the earth, locate me, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Thou power of darkness, cough out and vomit my virtues, in the name of Jesus.
4.    The sons of strangers shall build up my wall and kings shall minister unto me, in the name of Jesus.
5.    The timetable of my favour shall not be frustrated, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I arise above every destiny quencher by the power in the blood of Jesus.
7.    Every arrow of wickedness, emanating from my roots, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Wherever the enemy has knocked me down, O God, raise me up by Your power, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Every attempt to cover my glory, die, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I remove my name from the quota of destiny wastage, in the name of Jesus.
11.  The sun shall not smite me by day, nor the moon by night, in the name of Jesus.
12.  I shall not be cited as a negative example, this year, in the name of Jesus.
13.  Any power delegated to waste my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
14.  The hand of the enemy will not prevail against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
15.  I raise my staff of prayer to divide my Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
16.  I receive the miracle of supernatural promotion, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Every witchcraft agenda for my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Every robber of favour, die, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Every dream of affliction, die, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Anything that weakens the power of God in my tongue, die, in Jesus’ name.
21.  I destroy my pursuing bondage, in the name of Jesus.
22.  O Lord, dry up any evil river that is pursuing my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Every witchcraft chain, used to hold down my progress, break, in Jesus’ name.
24.  Every enemy of progress, within me, wither, in the name of Jesus.
25.  Lord, let me be extraordinary, in the name of Jesus.
26.  My Father, I recover all I have lost over the years, in the name of Jesus.
27.  I shall not be a negative expert, in the name of Jesus.
28.  My Father, disappoint all my Sanballat’s and Tobias, targeted against my achievements, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Thou Goliath of impossibility, die, in the name of Jesus.
30.  I shall laugh last over my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
31.  By fire, by thunder, I war in the spirit of Elijah, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Every evil power delaying the manifestation of my destiny, die, in Jesus’ name.
33.  Every attack of envious enemies, I command you to fail, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Every witchcraft agent in my place of work, receive the stripes of fire, in Jesus’ name.
35.  I will not go to the enemy for help, in the name of Jesus.
36.  You Pharaoh of my life, rush to and perish in the Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
37.  Hunger, arise and destroy all blood thirsty power, in the name of Jesus.
38.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
39.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
40.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
41.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: OH! LORD, LET MY PORTIONS BE RELEASED UNTO ME QUICKLY
fields.prayers:
Praise worship                                                                 
Scripture Reading - Psalm 3
Confession - Psalm 138:8
 
Prayer Points
            
1.      O Lord, repair my foundation to carry uncommon breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
2.      Any power boasting against my God, O God arise, and put them off, in the name of Jesus.
3.      Every evil handwriting against me, be cut off for ever, in the name of Jesus.
4.      No enchantment shall swallow me, in the name of Jesus.
5.      Everyone ordained for my blessings, appear, in the name of Jesus.
6.      Every infirmity, be swallowed up, in the name of Jesus.
7.      By me, the nakedness of my father’s house shall be taken away, in the name of Jesus.
8.      The foundation that gives my enemies strength, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.      That which killed my neighbor shall not kill me, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Every wilderness that wants to eat me shall scatter, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Whether my situation likes it or not, Pharaoh, let me go, in the name of Jesus.
12.  This year, there shall be a new oil on my head, in the name of Jesus.
13.  I call forth my promotion from the camp of the enemy, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Darkness shall not rejoice over my life, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Any power hunting for me this year, I cut you off, in the name of Jesus.
16.  Affliction by night, die, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Any power that has dug a hole for me shall fall into it, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Every work of wickedness assigned against me, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Every evil hand upon my star, wither, in the name of Jesus.
20.  I recover ten-fold all my wasted years, in the name of Jesus.
21.  This year, I shall not labor in vain, in the name of Jesus.
22.  Let the wind of the Lord blow away all the powers blocking my breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Darkness shall not take glory on my life, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Robbers that steal by day and affliction by night, die, in the name of Jesus.
25.  O Lord, this year, I enter into the chariot of Your fire, in the name of Jesus.
26.  Let the whirlwind of the Lord burn the heads of witchcraft gathering that is against my life, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Let every wickedness targeted at my life arise and harvest itself, in the name of Jesus.
28.  I step out from the company of my equals, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every sorrow afflicting my possessions, be consumed to ashes, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Avengers of the past, be silenced, in the name of Jesus.
31.  Every heart of stone lifted against me be shattered, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Every enchantment assigned for my downfall, die, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Satanic visitors in my dreams, that have wasted my possessions, die, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Every eater of good things in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
35.  Sudden destruction will not be my lot this year, in the name of Jesus.
36.  My portion shall not be given to another, in the name of Jesus.
37.  Every king Uzziah sitting on the throne of God in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
38.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
39.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
40.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
41.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

14.  Any witchcraft power posing as my husband/wife in my dream, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Holy Ghost, purge my blood from satanic injection, in the name of Jesus.
16.  O Lord, with Your power as Great Physician, come into my life now, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Every satanic bank manager, die, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Every power manipulating my divine information, die, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Archives of darkness, release my beneficial information, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Ancestral secrets behind my problems, be revealed, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Every bitter writing on my breakthroughs, die, in the name of Jesus.
22.  Every spiritual power, harassing me sexually, be smitten with blindness, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Every power of the wicked, prostrate and lick the dust, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Every power nominating me for termination or demotion, be disgraced, in Jesus’ name.
25.  All visible and invisible walls against my destiny, break, in the name of Jesus.
26.  I execute divine judgment against every demonic activity militating against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Every evil power delaying the manifestation of my destiny, die, in Jesus’ name.
28.  Every witchcraft prayer targeted at my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
29.  My Father, cast forth lightening to scatter every enemy of my destiny, in Jesus’ name.
30.  Every satanic intelligence working against my destiny, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
31.  O God of new beginnings, arise and promote me, in the name of Jesus.
32.  O rod of God, arise and divide my Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Every agenda of the power of the might against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
34.  I fire back, every arrow of backwardness, in the name of Jesus.
35.  I pull down every stronghold of satanic delay, in the name of Jesus.
36.  O God, arise and let my breakthroughs manifest, in the name of Jesus.
37.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
38.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
39.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
40.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: FRUSTRATING THE DEVICES OF THE ENEMIES
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Esther 6
Confession - Isaiah 8:10
                
PRAYER POINTS:
1.     O God, arise and let my situation change, in the name of Jesus.
2.     Every root of hardship, in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
3.     O God of advancement, advance my life, in the name of Jesus.
4.     My head, reject the covenant of failure, in the name of Jesus.
5.     My blood, reject the covenant of sickness, in the name of Jesus.
6.     Every power hired to pull me down, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
7.     Thou Lion of Judah, roar and pursue affliction out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
8.     Every witchcraft agenda, for my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.     Special announcement, road of affliction, close, in the name of Jesus.
10.   Every power, troubling my star, die, in the name of Jesus.
11.   Network of witchcraft, in my place of birth, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
12.   Every evil hand, pointing at my star, wither, in the name of Jesus.
13.   Every arrow of sickness, in my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
14.   Those who belittle me shall witness my progress, in the name of Jesus.
15.   Every destiny-demoting dream, vanish, in the name of Jesus.
16.   O God, arise and give me breakthroughs that will swallow my past failures, in the name of Jesus.
17.   O axe of heaven, arise, cut down the root of my trouble, in the name of Jesus.
18.   Every dream sponsored by witchcraft, die, in the name of Jesus.
19.   Thou power of God, uproot wicked plantations from my life, in the name of Jesus.
20.   Anything stolen from my destiny, from the womb, I recover you, in the name of Jesus.
21.   Every power promoting captivity in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
22.   Every agenda of my father’s house, to waste my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
23.   Rod of God, arise, divide my Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
24.   Every power pronouncing sudden death upon my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
25.   Finger of God, arise, disgrace every magician working against me, in the name of Jesus.
26.   Every power working against my prayers, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.   Anti-deliverance powers, I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
28.   Any evil umbrella, covering my head, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
29.   Every covering blocking me from uncommon breakthroughs, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
30.   Every smoke-screen of the enemy against my prayers, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
31.   Every screen being used by the enemy to monitor me, break, in the name of Jesus.
32.   I destroy any material used in the spirit world to attack me, in the name of Jesus.
33.   Every power of dead human spirits, working against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
34.   I cancel my name from the register of satan, in the name of Jesus.
35.   Thou power of the devourers, die, in the name of Jesus.
36.   Any satanic salt-covenant made through any food I have eaten, break, in the name of Jesus.
37.   O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
38.   Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
39.   O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
40.   Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus

fields.title: PULLING DOWN THE STRONGHOLD OF SATANIC DELAY
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Luke 13:10-17
  Confession - Psalm 138:8
PRAYER POINTS
1.     My glory, receive resurrection, in the name of Jesus.
2.     I arrest every power arresting my breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
3.     Yokes of satanic delay on my breakthroughs, break, in the name of Jesus.
4.     Fire of God, arise, bombard the camp of my oppressors, in the name of Jesus.
5.     Every power behind my problems, die, in the name of Jesus.
6.     Fire of God, arise in anger and destroy every destroyer targeted at my life, in the name of Jesus.
7.     Every unseen fire, burning in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.     Every gathering of slaughterers against my life, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
9.     Dream acquired yokes in my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
10.   My life, disobey the voice of enchanters, in the name of Jesus.
11.   Every citadel of frustration, targeted against my life, break, in the name of Jesus.
12.   Let multiple chaos pursue my pursuer, in the name of Jesus.
13.   Every conspiracy assigned to demote me, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
14.   Holy Ghost fire, burn every deposit of darkness in my body to ashes, in the name of Jesus.
15.   Every evil hand, pointed against my star, wither now, in the name of Jesus.
16.   My Father, arise by fire, and defend my portions, in the name of Jesus.
17.   Let the belly of the earth release my buried virtues, in the name of Jesus.
18.   Every commandment of darkness, against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
19.   Any satanic intermediary, assigned against me, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
20.   Let locations of arrows assigned against me catch fire, in the name of Jesus.
21.   Let the powers of the empties surrounding my breakthroughs die, in the name of Jesus.
22.   Any power assigned to demote my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
23.   Let the magnet of infirmity backfire, in the name of Jesus.
24.   Thou power of God, break every yoke of limitation upon my life, in the name of Jesus.
25.   Wealth of the gentiles, arise and locate me, in the name of Jesus.
26.   Powers of affliction and oppression, targeted against my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.   O finger of God, arise, command my lifting up, in the name of Jesus.
28.   Every power assigned against my foreign wealth, die, in the name of Jesus.
29.   Let the favour, that brings repossession, locate my life, in the name of Jesus.
30.   Every well that I have lost, open, in the name of Jesus.
31.   Well of prosperity, open unto me, in the name of Jesus.
32.   My stolen property, trouble the thief, in the name of Jesus.
33.   Gates of death, reject my life, in the name of Jesus.
34.   Every appointment with death, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
35.   Every garment, exposing me to attack, roast, in the name of Jesus.
36.   Every strange thing in my flesh, come out and die, in the name of Jesus.
37.   O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
38.   Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
39.   O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
40.   Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: IT IS MY TIME TO LAUGH AND REJOICE
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Genesis 41
Confession - Psalm 16:6
PRAYER POINTS 
1.    I reject every satanic re-arrangement of my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
2.    I refuse to live below my divine standard, in the name of Jesus.
3.    The enemy will not convert my body to rags, in the name of Jesus.
4.    The enemy will not convert my destiny to rags, in the name of Jesus.
5.    O Lord, restore me to Your original design for my life.
6.    O Lord, enlarge my coast.
7.    Every power contending with my divine destiny, scatter unto desolation, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Let the spirit of excellence come upon me, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Let the earthquake, sea quake, air quake destroys every demotes assigned against my life, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I command all the enemies of Jesus Christ that have access to my progress to leave and never to return, in the name of Jesus.
11.  I paralyze every satanic opportunity contending against my life, in the name of Jesus.
12.  Every incantation, ritual and witchcraft power against my destiny, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
13.  I render null and void the influence of destiny swallowers, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Every household wickedness struggling to re-arrange my destiny, loose your hold and die, in Jesus name.
15.  The rod of the wicked shall not rest upon my life, in the name of Jesus.
16.  I refuse to be removed from the divine agenda of God for my life, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Holy spirit, I invite You into my imagination.
18.  O Lord, bring to light every darkness shielding my potentials, in the name of Jesus.
19.  I break every curse of backwardness, in the name of Jesus.
20.  I shall not come to the world in vain, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Lord Jesus, manifest Yourself in my life by Your name called ‘Wonderful’.
22.  Every bird of death assigned against me, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
23.  I withdraw my progress from every satanic regulation and domination, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Every deeply entrenched problem, dry to the roots, in the name of Jesus.
25.  Every stronghold of failure, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
26. Use the underlisted weapons against the under listed problems and pray aggressively.  For example, “Every destiny killer, receive the fire of God,
      in the name of Jesus.’
 27. O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
28. Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
29. O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
30. Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: SILENCING THE EVIL CRY OF ANCESTRAL IDOLS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship                    
Scripture Reading - Acts 19
Confession - Obadiah 1:3-4 
 
Prayer Points:
1.    I repent from all ancestral idol worship, in the name of Jesus.
2.    Every idol of my father’s house, lose your hold over my life, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every strongman of the idol of my father’s house, die, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I silence the evil cry of any idol fashioned against me, in the name of Jesus.
5.    All consequences of ancestral idol worship upon my life, I wipe you off by the blood of Jesus.
6.    Holy Ghost fire, burn down all spiritual shrines of my father’s house, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Oppression agenda of my family idol, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every blood speaking against my generational line, be silenced by the blood of Jesus.
9.    Every idol power speaking against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I break all ancestral covenants with any idol power, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Every bitter water flowing in my family from any idol, dry up, in the name of Jesus.

17.  Every satanic priest ministering in my family line, be retrenched, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Arrows of affliction originating from idolatry, loose your hold, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Every influence of idol worship in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Every network of idol power in my place of birth, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Every satanic dedication that speaks against me, be dismantled by the power in the blood of Jesus.
22.  I vomit every food with idolatrous influence that I have eaten, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Every unconscious evil internal altar, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Let the stone of hindrance constructed by family idol be rolled away, in the name of Jesus.
25.  The voice of foundational idols will never speak again, in the name of Jesus.
26.  Every strongman assigned by the idols of my father’s house against my life, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Every satanic promissory note issued on my behalf by my ancestors, be reversed, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Garments of opposition designed by ancestral idols, roast, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every satanic cloud upon my life, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
30.  My glory buried by family idols, come alive by fire, in the name of Jesus.
31.  Thou power of strange gods legislating against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Idols of my place of birth, I break your chain, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Thou vagabond power assigned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
34.  I puncture the imagination of oppression targeted against me, in the name of Jesus.
35.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
36.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter
36.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
37.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
38.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: PUTTING TO SHAME THE APOSTLES OF SATAN
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - 1Kings 18
Confession - Isaiah 7:7-11
Prayer Points 
1.   O God, arise and visit all shrines assigned against me with thunder and earthquake, in the name of Jesus.
2.   All satanic altars, erected against my destiny, be overthrown by fire, in the name of Jesus.
3.   O God, arise and set unquenchable fire upon every coven of darkness assigned against me, in the name of Jesus.
4.   All images, carved against my life, break into pieces after the order of Dagon, in the name of Jesus.
5.   O God, arise and cause confusion in the camp of my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
6.   I decree that my oppressors shall consult their powers in their confusion, but there will be no response, in the name of Jesus.
7.   Holy Ghost fire, arise and stir up civil war in the camp of my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
8.   I command every satanic intermediary working against me to lose heart, in the name of Jesus.
9.   O God, arise and bring the plans of my oppressors to nothing, in the name of Jesus.
10. My Father, set up a fierce king against my oppressors and let the king treat them with great torture, in the name of Jesus.
11. Let the power of God intimidate and frustrate all diviners assigned against me, in the name of Jesus.
12. O God, arise and wipe out the understanding of my stubborn pursuers, in the name of Jesus.
13. O God, pour out the spirit of dizziness upon all evil spiritual consultants speaking against me, in the name of Jesus.
14. Let these evil spiritual consultants stagger in all they do as a drunkard staggers in his vomit, in the name of Jesus,
15. By the power in the blood of Jesus, let all soothsayers, witchdoctors, enchanters arrange against me be cut off, in the name of Jesus.
16. O heavens, O earth, hear the word of the Lord: you must not execute the counsel of my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
17. O God, pass through the camp of my enemies with affliction and drain the anointing of wickedness, in the name of Jesus.
18. Every power assigned to wreck my destiny, your end has come, die, in the name of Jesus.
19. I de-program and cancel all negative prophecies pronounced against me, in the name of Jesus.
20. O Lord, guide me into the mysteries of my life.
21. O Lord, give me the keys to unlock the hidden riches of secret places.
22. All ancient doors that have hindered the plan of God for my life, be unlocked by fire, in the name of Jesus.
23. I destroy every agreement made at covens and satanic centers against me, in the name of Jesus.
24. Every secret code, evil registers and archives of the enemy in my place of birth, be roasted, in the name of Jesus.
25. O God, arise and cast abominable filth upon witches and wizards and set them as gazing stock, in the name of Jesus.
26. Let the tables of witches and wizards become snares unto them, in the name of Jesus.
27. Let the eyes of witches monitoring my life be darkened, in the name of Jesus.
28. Let the covens of witchcraft become desolate, let there be no one to dwell in them, in the name of Jesus.
29. I command crash-landing of witches and wizards assigned against my breakthrough, in the name of Jesus.
30. I command the sun to smite my oppressors in the day and the moon and stars to smite them at night, in the name of Jesus.
31. I command the stars in their courses to fight against my stubborn pursuers, in the name of Jesus.
32. O God, arise, roar and prevail over my enemies, in the name of Jesus.
33. Let the gathering of the wicked against me be harvested for judgment, in the name of Jesus.
34. O God, arise and hang every Haman assigned against my life, in the name of Jesus.
35. Every stumbling block to God's prophetic agenda on my life be rooted out, in the name of Jesus.
36. All negative words that have been spoken against me by evil men die, in the name of Jesus.
37. All evil records, evil marriage certificates and registers that are kept in satanic archives against me, be wiped off by the blood of Jesus.
38. I program divine health, divine favour, long life, spiritual advancement into my life by the power in the blood of Jesus.
39. I close down every spiritual ship carting away my benefits, in the name of Jesus.
40. O God, arise and lay waste all the operations of dark forces working against me, in the name of Jesus.
41. O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
42. Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
43. O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
44. Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: CASTING DESTRUCTION UNTO PROBLEM MOUNTAINS
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - 1Kings 18
Confession:
Job 22:28 says, “Thou shalt also decree a thing, and it shall be established unto thee: and the light shall shine upon thy ways.”
 Prayer Points:
1.    Every strange power gathered against my advancement be destroyed in the name of Jesus.
2.    Lord, send Your angel to sow terror and panic into the hearts of all evil doers gathered for my sake in the name of Jesus.
3.    Every satanic vigil against me scatter in the name of Jesus.
4.    Let all the eaters of flesh and drinkers of blood stumble and fall in the name of Jesus.
5.    O Lord change my present speed and grant me new speed according to Your will in the name of Jesus.
6.    Ancestral wall built around my glory be pulled down in the name of Jesus.
7.    O Lord divide the tongues of the enemy in the name of Jesus.
8.     My glory that is under bondage receive deliverance by fire in the name of Jesus.
9.     Mountains before me I dash you to pieces in the name of Jesus.
10.     My breakthroughs in captivity come forth in the name of Jesus.
11.     Every unprofitable tree growing in any department of my life be uprooted in the name of Jesus.
12.     My potentials that are caged by the enemies receive deliverance in the name of Jesus.
13.     Every foundational curse be uprooted in the name of Jesus.
14.     My growth that is under restriction be released in the name of Jesus.
15.     Every evil tree that the father has not planted in my life be uprooted in the name of Jesus.
16.     You evil tree be cast into the fire in the name of Jesus.
17.     All the chains of multiple curses in my life be broken down in the name of Jesus.
18.     Blood of Jesus begin to wash away all multiple curses working against my life in the name of Jesus.
19.     Every good thing that has been paralyzed as a result of multiple curses receive the power of resurrection now in the name of Jesus.
20.     No power of multiple curses shall have any hold upon my life, I receive total freedom now in the name of Jesus.
21.     Today Lord I am loosed and freed from the power of multiple curses in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: THOU POWER OF ANCESTRAL IDOLS DIE
fields.prayers:
PRAISE WORSHIP 
SCRIPTURE READING:    EXODUS 20
CONFESSION:    Psalm 2:8-9 "Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession. [9] Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel."
PRAYER POINTS       
1.    Holy Ghost fire, burn every foundation altar working against me in the name of Jesus.
2.    I pull out my destiny from every evil control in the name of Jesus.
3.    O God arise and let all my stubborn enemies be scattered in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every yoke of the oppressor be broken in the name of Jesus.
5.    I pull down every stronghold of negative altars in the name of Jesus.
6.    Thou power of God, shatter every agenda of foundational idolatry designed against my destiny in the name of Jesus.
7.    I retire by fire every occult priest divining against me in the name of Jesus.
8.    I shall not be a victim of destiny vandalization in the name of Jesus.
9.    O altar of darkness, hear the word of the Lord, be dismantled by fire in the name of Jesus.
10.    Thou power of my family idol die in the name of Jesus.
11.    Every evil power of my family idol, what are you waiting for die in the name of Jesus.
12.    Every wicked foundation prepared for me by my family idols die in the name of Jesus.
13.    I release myself from the cage of family idols in the name of Jesus.
14.    Blood of Jesus break every blood connection between me and every family idol in the name of Jesus.
15.    I declare myself free from every evil dedication that speaks against me in the name of Jesus.
16.    Every yoke and burden of generational idolatry break in the name of Jesus.
17.    I rise above every power of foundational idolatry in the name of Jesus.
18.    I speak destruction unto every evil altar working against me in the name of Jesus.
19.    I separate my life from all evil idols present in my place of birth in the name of Jesus.
20.    I claim my freedom from the consequences of idolatry in the name of Jesus.
21.    I break and cancel every covenant with any idol and the yokes attached to it in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: CRUSHING THE GRIP OF EVIL ANCESTRAL POWERS
fields.prayers:
PRAISE WORSHIP
 SCRIPTURE READING:     Psalm 106
 CONFESSION:         Col. 2:14-15
Prayer Points
1.         I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus.  I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me. I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies. I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars. They must not smite me. I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year.  This is the year the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it.  I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year.  I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void.  I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus.  Spirits of favor, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in the name of Jesus. I shall excel this year and nothing shall defile me.  I shall posses the gates of my enemies.
2.         The Lord shall anoint me with the oil of gladness above my fellows.  The fire of the enemy shall not burn me.  My ears shall hear good news and I shall not hear the voice of the enemy.  My future is secured in Christ, in the name of Jesus.  God has created me to do some definite services.  He has committed into my hands some assignments which He has not committed to anybody. He has not created me for nothing. I shall do good. I shall do His work.  I shall be an agent of peace.  I will trust Him in whatever I do and wherever I am.  I can never be thrown away or downgraded.  There will be no poverty of body, soul and spirit in my life this year.  The anointing of God upon my life gives me favor in the eyes of God and man all the days of my life.  I shall not labor in vain.  I shall walk this year in victory and liberty of the spirit.
3.       Covenant and power of kolanut and alligator pepper linking me to evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
4.          Covenant and power of any libation linking me to evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
5.          Power of any mark or incision linking me with evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
6.     I separate myself from any evil tree representing my destiny, I curse the tree to die, in the name of Jesus.
7.          Thou power of evil handshake, die, in the name of Jesus.
8.          Thou power of evil laying of hands on my head, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.          Every naming ceremony ritual linking me with evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
10.      Evil powder or pomade linking me with evil ancestral powers, die, in Jesus' name.
11.      Every pronouncement upon my life in favor of evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
12.   Any conscious or unconscious evil initiation from the womb, break and scatter, in the name of Jesus.
13.      Let the power and consequence of any witchdoctor treatment upon my life die, in the name of Jesus.
14.      Any traditional ceremony linking me up with evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
15.      I reject and vomit every evil communion taken with evil ancestral spirits through evil festivals, in the name of Jesus.
16.      Any food taken from the table of the devil, die, in the name of Jesus.
17.      Guarding evil ancestral angels, loose your hold upon my life, in the name of Jesus.
18.      Any sacrifice exposing me to the evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
19.      I break and terminate the power and influence of family idols over my life, in the name of Jesus.
20.      Ancient and recently invited and uninvited idols in my family line, I terminate your powers, in the name of Jesus.
21.      Every evil water inside me bearing witness and linking me to evil ancestral powers, I vomit you now by fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.      Any evil water baptism holding me in bondage to evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
23.   Any wrong use or disposal of my placenta, linking me with evil ancestral powers, I cancel you now, in the name of Jesus.
24.      Any evil promise or debt linking me with evil ancestral powers, I settle it with the blood of Jesus.
25.      Any cowry revealing my secrets, die, in the name of Jesus.
26.      Any bead, bangle or rings linking me with evil ancestral powers die, in the name of Jesus.
27.   Any gift implicating me before evil ancestral powers, catch fire, in the name of Jesus.
28   Any sand linking me with evil ancestral powers, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
29.       Any power hiding under evil ancestral cover to fight me, die, in the name of Jesus.
30.       I reject the government of evil ancestral powers upon my family line, in the name of Jesus.
31.       I cut off every spiritual umbilical cord linking me with evil ancestral powers, in the name of Jesus.
32.       I blot out my name and record from every evil ancestral register, in Jesus' name.
33.       Every evil ancestral pollution, release my life, by fire, in the name of Jesus.
34.       I recover any lost glory, in the name of Jesus.
35.       Victory of evil ancestral powers over my life, I bury you today, in Jesus' name.
36.       Every arrow of sickness from evil ancestral powers, backfire, in the name of Jesus.
37.       Every evil ancestral mortar pounding my blessing, die, in the name of Jesus.
38.       Any evil ancestral pot swallowing my blessings, vomit them by fire, in the name of Jesus.
39.       Every evil trade by batter, concerning me, made with evil ancestral powers, break, in the name of Jesus.
40.       Any money or coin linking me to evil ancestral powers, die, in the name of Jesus.
41.       O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
42.       Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus' name.
43.       O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
44.       Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: MY COVENANT WITH GOD THIS YEAR
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Psalm 2:4; 71:21; Eph. 3:20
PRAYER POINTS
1.    O Lord, connect me with the people that matter this year, in the name of Jesus.
2.    O God, arise and order my steps this year, in the name of Jesus.
3.    My legs, hear the word of the Lord, carry me to the place of my destiny this year, in the name of Jesus.
4.    This year, I will get to the right position, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Father, redeem me from the power of death, doom and disaster, in the name of Jesus.
6.    God will bless them that bless me and curse them that curse me this year, in the name of Jesus.
7.    This year, the storm of life will not sweep me away, in the name of Jesus.
8.    I declare that all my journeys this year shall be safe, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Holy Ghost, arise and service every part of my body for strength and health, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Preserve my life, O Lord, from all sicknesses this year and all the days of my life, in the name of Jesus.
11.  O God, arise and give me divine power to produce wealth this year, in the name of Jesus.
12.  This year, I shall not fall from grace, in the name of Jesus.
13.  O Lord, I shall be surrounded by Your wall of fire throughout this year, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Every financial grave dug for me this year, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Every cloud of evil over my life, I blow you away, in the name of Jesus.
16.  Let the angels of God be installed as the gate-keepers of my habitation, in the name of Jesus.
17.  This year, satanic nightmare will not harm me, in the name of Jesus.
18.  This year, every enemy of my life will stumble and fall, in the name of Jesus.
19.  No divination nor enchantment from evil men will work against my life and family, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Let every lost opportunity begin to come my way this year, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Weeping and oppression of the night, expire today, in the name of Jesus.
22.  I command my portion to be released this year, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Decision and judgment of the council of hell against my life, I terminate you now, in the name of Jesus.
24.  I receive my daily increase and enlargement this year, in the name of Jesus.
25.  Darkness shall have no portion in my life this year, in the name of Jesus.
26.  O God, arise and pull me out of every pit of evil foundation, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Seven spirits of God (Isa. 11:2), manifest in my life, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Let my killer begin to kill himself right now, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every trap prepared for me by the enemy, turn around and catch your owner, in the name of Jesus.
30.  I command the baptism of madness and backwardness to fall upon my stubborn enemies, in the name of Jesus.
31.  My testimony will not be buried, in the name of Jesus.
32.  I will not suffer what my parents suffered, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Seed of untimely death, die, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Seed of greatness in my life, manifest, in the name of Jesus.
35.  This year, wealth and riches shall be in my house, in the name of Jesus.
36.  This year, I shall have no fear of bad news, in the name of Jesus.
37.  This year, I shall triumph over all evil forces, in the name of Jesus.
38.  This year, my life shall be a reference point for success and breakthroughs, in the name of Jesus.
39.  O God arise and arrest the arrester of my prosperity, in the name of Jesus.
40.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
41.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
42.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
43.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: LET MY DAYS SPEAK FOR ME
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Job 38:12
PRAYER POINTS
1.    Holy Ghost fire, pass through my body and burn all satanic deposits, in the name of Jesus.
2.    Every handwriting of the wicked on my body, blood of Jesus, wipe them out, in the name of Jesus.
3.    Curses of leaking blessings, break, in the name of Jesus.
4.    Every wall standing between me and divine visitation, crumble, in the name of Jesus.
5.    All satanic decisions taken at witchcraft meeting against me, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
6.    I cancel bad news and sorrow, in the name of Jesus.
7.    O God of Elijah, arise by fire, disappoint my adversaries, in the name of Jesus.
8.    I break into unprecedented favour, in the name of Jesus.
9.    My enemies shall not celebrate my demotion, in the name of Jesus.
10.  O God arise and show me surplus mercy, in the name of Jesus.
11.  I reject shame. I claim glory. I must arise and shine, in the name of Jesus.
12.  I bind all demonic radio lines now, in the name of Jesus.
13.  Every bitter water assigned against me, dry up, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Weapons of the wicked, hear my battle cry, return against them seven-fold, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Do something in my life that would make the world to say ‘this is the finger of God’, in the name of Jesus.
16.  I receive divine immunization for me and my family, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Every disease agent living in my body, die, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Dead works in my life, your end has come, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Visitation of darkness, expire, in the name of Jesus.
20.  I shall not be a meat for the enemy, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Strange wind of wickedness against my soul, die, in the name of Jesus.
22.  Blood of Jesus, walk through my life, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Blood of Jesus, open up the good gates shut against me, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Blood of Jesus, restructure my foundation, in the name of Jesus.
25.  O Lord, establish your hand upon my hand, in the name of Jesus.
26.  O Lord, let my day begin to speak, in the name of Jesus.
27.  Every demon fighting against my destiny, I anoint them to kill themselves, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Let my persecution become my testimony, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every word spoken to cut down my destiny, die, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Thou power of strange gods legislating against my destiny, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
31.  Idols of my place of birth, I break your chains, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Thou vagabond power assigned against me, die, in the name of Jesus.
33.  I quench the rage of the enemy against my destiny, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Let every evil fire prepared against my life be quenched, in the name of Jesus.
35.  Let every candle and incense ignited for my sake be quenched, in the name of Jesus.
36.  Let every satanic oracle directed against me be disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
37.  Let every satanic ritual directed against me be disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
38.  O God, turn the counsel of evil counselors against me to foolishness, in the name of Jesus.
39.  I come against every program of Satan against me, in the name of Jesus.
40.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
41.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in Jesus’ name.
42.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.
43.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: GREAT MOUNTAINS, THOU SHALL BE A PLAIN
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Acts 12
Confession - Zech. 4:6-7
 
PRAYER POINTS
 
1.    O Lord, I put myself in Your hands.
2.    I promise to do what You want me to do, in the name of Jesus.
3.    O Lord, I will make the decision You want me to make.
4.    Lord, like a potter in the hands of the clay, make what You want out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
5.    Take me, O Lord, and give me whatever shape You want.
6.    If You want, O Lord, break the clay of my life to pieces and start over again.
7.    Lord, do with me whatever You want.
8.    Let it be done according to Your will in my life, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Let it be done according to Your word in my life, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Let divine patience settle in my life, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Every power asking for my head in a charger, fall down and die, in the name of Jesus.
12.  By the power that killed Haman in place of Mordecai, let those who hate my existence be disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
13.  Agents of sorrow that are pursuing me, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Terminators of my father’s house, die, in the name of Jesus.
15.  Satanic sacrifices made for my sake, be rendered impotent, in the name of Jesus.
16.  Circle of confusion, break, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Thou city of confusion in my life, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
18.  My hands are blessed, in the name of Jesus.
19.  My feet are blessed, in the name of Jesus.
20.  I soak the root of all sicknesses in my life with the blood of Jesus, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Wherever my spirit has been locked up, break loose by fire, in the name of Jesus.
22.  I will not fail as salt of the earth, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Fire of God, roast all witchcraft bags holding my finances, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Evil blood-sucking powers, suck yourselves, in the name of Jesus.
25.  I dismantle every blockage in the dream, in the name of Jesus.
26.  Every satanic bank manager, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.  I terminated the appointment of the spirit of backwardness, in the name of Jesus.
28.  Spirit of spiritual slumber, get out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every wall of Jericho erected against my success, be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Pharaoh of backwardness, I bury you today, in the name of Jesus.
31.  Every unrighteous swearing of my ancestors, be cancelled, in the name of Jesus.
32.  Every dark hand in my foundation, fighting my destiny, wither, in the name of Jesus.
33.  Anything stolen from my destiny in the womb, I recover you by fire, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Any power waiting for my day of honor to disgrace me, die, in the name of Jesus.
35.  Every power promoting captivity in my life, die, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: WAGING WAR AGAINST THE POWERS OF THE NIGHT
fields.prayers:
Praise worship                                                    
Scripture Reading - Psalm 27
Confessions - Psalm 125:3
Make these confessions violently. The word of God concerning my life is settled in heaven.  I bind myself to the eternal word of God.  I decree that any dream, word, vision, that did not originate from God are cancelled in my life.  Every tree my heavenly Father has not planted, I uproot them, in the name of Jesus. I fire back, every spiritual bullet fired against me in my dreams. I surround myself with the fire of God. No power of darkness will have a way into my life again. My Father, let Your heavenly hosts and Your warriors, take over my battles.  Oh Lord of hosts, arise and fight for me. I arise and put on the whole armor of God and I resist every power of darkness.  Every power assigned to manipulate my life, I crush you, in the name of Jesus.  Every evil spirit that has attacked me in my dream, I command you to be disgraced, in the name of Jesus. By the power in the blood of Jesus, be bound and overthrown.
 
PRAYER POINTS:
 
1.    I renounce every conscious and unconscious familiar spirit and I reject your covenant, in the name of Jesus.
2.    You the spirit of grave and death, be scattered, in the name of Jesus.
3.    I cancel every curse of untimely death sent against me, in the name of Jesus.
4.    I refuse to die before my time, in the name of Jesus.
5.    I plead the blood of Jesus over my body, soul and spirit and neutralize every satanic poison deposited in my life.
6.    Sickness, pain and weakness, get out of my system, in the name of Jesus.
7.    Every disease, planted into my body, through dreams, get out, in the name of Jesus.
8.    Every effort of the enemy to weaken my prayer life, die, in the name of Jesus.
9.    I cancel every dream of hopelessness, in the name of Jesus.
10.  I banish every senseless and meaningless dream, in the name of Jesus.
11.  Negative dreams shall not come to past in my life, in the name of Jesus.
12.  You spiritual cannibals, vomit my blood and flesh now, in the name of Jesus.
13.  You evil night workers, I crush your powers, in the name of Jesus.
14.  Every spirit that has been oppressing me in my dreams, I declare my house and room danger zones for you, in Jesus’ name.
15.  You the powers of the night, I command the power of God to pursue you, in the name of Jesus.
16.  You the powers of the night, I command the sword of the Lord to slay you, in the name of Jesus.
17.  Every evil power of the ministers of the night, be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
18.  Every cord of the powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
19.  Every snare of the powers of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
20.  Every evil control of the powers of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
21.  Every evil bondage of the powers of the night, break, in the name of Jesus.
22.  Let every work of the powers of the night be exposed and brought to the light, in the name of Jesus.
23.  Thou evil powers of the night, be humbled and disgraced, in the name of Jesus.
24.  Let the evil throne of the powers of the night be dismantled by the thunder power of God, in the name of Jesus.
25.  Every magical operation of the night, be destroyed, in the name of Jesus.
26.  Every enchantment and witchcraft powers of the night, die, in the name of Jesus.
27.  I heap shame and vengeance of the Lord upon every evil power of the night, in the name of Jesus.
28.  All curses of the evil powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
29.  Every evil soul tie that is influencing me with the evil powers of the night, be broken, in the name of Jesus.
30.  Every door opened by the evil powers of the night, be closed, in the name of Jesus.
31.  I attack and destroy all areas of control held by the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus. 
32.  Quencher of deliverance, die, in the name of Jesus.
33.  I cancel all plans and programs of the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus.
34.  I de-program every assignment of the evil powers of the night, in the name of Jesus.
35.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.

37.  O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.

fields.title: COMMAND THE YEAR IN YOUR FAVOUR
fields.prayers:
Praise Worship
Scripture Reading:     Psalm 91
Confession:    Psalm 91
PRAYER POINTS
1.      I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus. I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me.  I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies. I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars. They must not smite me. I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year. This is the year the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it. I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year.  I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void.  I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus. Spirits of favour, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in the name of Jesus. I shall excel this year and nothing shall defile me. I shall posses the gates of my enemies.
2.      The Lord shall anoint me with the oil of gladness above my fellows.  The fire of the enemy shall not burn me.  My ears shall hear good news and I shall not hear the voice of the enemy. My future is secured in Christ, in the name of Jesus. God has created me to do some definite services. He has committed into my hands some assignments which He has not committed to anybody. He has not created me for nothing. I shall do good. I shall do His work. I shall be an agent of peace.  I will trust Him in whatever I do and wherever I am.  I can never be thrown away or downgraded. There will be no poverty of body, soul and spirit in my life this year. The anointing of God upon my life gives me favour in the eyes of God and man all the days of my life. I shall not labor in vain.  I shall walk this year in victory and liberty of the spirit.
3.      This year the Lord will make me a cheap winner and a candidate of uncommon testimonies in the name of Jesus.
4.      This year, I receive daily bread, good seed to sow every time, and money to spend always, in the name of Jesus.
5.      In this year, my life advertises the glory of God, in the name of Jesus.
6.      I cancel all appointments with sorrow, tragedy and evil tears this year, in the name of Jesus.
7.      This year, I will encounter and experience full scale laughter in all fronts, in the name of Jesus.
8.      As from now on, blood-thirsty demons and robbers will respect my appearance, in the name of Jesus.
9.   Whether I am on the sea, in the air or on the road, the evil forces there will bow to my authority, in the name of Jesus.
10.  Anything I have waited for till now, for a long time, shall be miraculously delivered to me this year, in the name of Jesus.
11.  My Father, make me and my family members completely immune to any form of sickness or disease this year, in the name of Jesus.
12.  This year, I put myself and members of my family into the protective envelope of divine fire in the name of Jesus.
13.  This year, I will do the will of God and I will serve God in the name of Jesus.
14.  This year, will have unconquerable victory, in Jesus name.
15.  This year, like a clay in the hands of the potter, the Lord will make what He wants out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
16.  This year, the Lord will do with me whatever He wants, in the name of Jesus.
17.  This year, the Lord will make me the head and not tail in Jesus name.
18.  This year, every snare of the fowler assigned against me shall perish in Jesus name.
19.  This year, I render the habitation of darkness assigned against me desolate, in the name of Jesus.
20.  This year, divine deposits shall settle in my life in the name of Jesus.
21.  This year, I enter into the covenant of favor, in the name of Jesus.
22.  This year, the anointing of success and fruitfulness shall rest on me, in the name of Jesus.
23.  This year, I will not be a candidate of sweating without result, in Jesus' name.
24.  This year, all obstacles on my way of progress shall be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
25.  This year, my God shall arise and my stubborn pursuers shall scatter in Jesus name.
26.  This year, those that mock me in the past shall celebrate with me, in Jesus' name.
27.  This year, my Goliath and Hamman shall experience destruction in the name of Jesus.
28.  This year, every power assigned to cut short my life shall die, in the name of Jesus.
29.  This year, my prayers shall always provoke angelic violence for my good in Jesus- name.
30.  This year, I shall speak and my words shall bring testimonies, in the name of Jesus.
31.  O thou that troubles   the Israel of Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
32.  Every enemy of the Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, scatter, in the name of Jesus.
33.  O God, arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, in the name of Jesus.
34.  Let the fire of revival fall upon Army of Jesus Christ Ministry, in the name of Jesus.

fields.title: OH! LORD, GLORIFY YOUR NAME IN MY LIFE
fields.prayers:
Praise worship
Scripture Reading - Psalm 91
Confession - Psalm 91
PRAYER POINTS
1.       I take authority over this year, in the name of Jesus. I decree that all the elements of this year will cooperate with me. I decree that these elemental forces should refuse to cooperate with my enemies. I speak unto the sun, the moon and the stars. They must not smite me. I pull down every negative energy planning to operate against my life this year. This is the year the Lord has made; I will rejoice and be glad in it. I dismantle any power uttering incantations to capture this year. I render such incantations and satanic prayer null and void. I retrieve this year out of their hands, in the name of Jesus. Spirits of favor, counsel, might and power, come upon me, in the name of Jesus. I shall excel this year and nothing shall defile me. I shall posses the gates of my enemies.
2.       The Lord shall anoint me with the oil of gladness above my fellows. The fire of the enemy shall not burn me. My ears shall hear good news and I shall not hear the voice of the enemy. My future is secured in Christ, in the name of Jesus. God has created me to do some definite services. He has committed into my hands some assignments which He has not committed to anybody. He has not created me for nothing. I shall do good. I shall do His work. I shall be an agent of peace. I will trust Him in whatever I do and wherever I am. I can never be thrown away or downgraded. There will be no poverty of body, soul and spirit in my life this year. The anointing of God upon my life gives me favor in the eyes of God and man all the days of my life. I shall not labor in vain. I shall walk this year in victory and liberty of the spirit.
 
3.       This year the Lord will bless me and enlarge my coast, in the name of Jesus.
4.       This year, I receive daily bread, good seed to sow every time, and money to spend always, in the name of Jesus.
5.       My Father, let me be the advertisement of Your power this year, in Jesus' name.
6.       I cancel all appointments with sorrow, tragedy and evil tears this year, in the name of Jesus.
7.       This year, I will encounter and experience full scale laughter in all fronts, in the name of Jesus.
8.       As from now on, blood-thirsty demons and robbers will respect my appearance, in the name of Jesus.
9.    Whether I am on the sea, in the air or on the road, the evil forces there will bow to my authority, in the name of Jesus.
10.   Anything I have waited for till now, for a long time, shall be miraculously delivered to me this year, in the name of Jesus.
11.   My Father, make me and my family members completely immune to any form of sickness or disease this year, in the name of Jesus.
12.   This year, I put myself and members of my family into the hands of the Lord, in the name of Jesus.
13.   This year, I will do what the Lord wants me to do, in the name of Jesus.
14.   This year, I will make the decisions the Lord wants me to make, in Jesus' name.
15.   This year, like a clay in the hands of the potter, the Lord will make what He wants out of my life, in the name of Jesus.
16.   This year, the Lord will do with me whatever He wants, in the name of Jesus.
17.   This year, the Lord will give me whatever shape He wants, in Jesus' name.
18.   This year, it shall be unto me according to the word of the Lord, in Jesus' name.
19.   This year, it shall be unto me according to the will of the Lord for my life, in the name of Jesus.
20.   This year, divine patience shall settle in my life, in the name of Jesus.
21.   This year, I enter into the covenant of favor, in the name of Jesus.
22.   This year, the anointing of success and fruitfulness shall rest on me, in the name of Jesus.
23.   This year, I will not be a candidate of sweating without result, in Jesus' name.
24.   This year, all obstacles on my way of progress shall be dismantled, in the name of Jesus.
25.   This year, my God shall arise and circulate my name for favor, in Jesus' name.
26.   This year, those that despise me in the past shall seek my favor, in Jesus' name.
27.  This year, evil will not build in me, in the name of Jesus.
28.  This year, the Pharaoh of backwardness pursuing me shall perish in the Red Sea, in the name of Jesus.
29.  This year, I will arise and shine for the glory of God is upon me, in Jesus' name.
30.  This year, all the terminators of my father's house shall die, in the name of Jesus.
31.  0 thou that troubles   the Israel of Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, the God of Elijah shall trouble you today.
32.  Every enemy of the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries, scatter, in the name of Jesus
33.   O God arise and uproot anything You did not plant inside the Mountain of Fire and Miracles Ministries.

[2] When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell.
